original: pa smra'o // ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: pa smra'o // ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because:

original: dngos po yod pa ma yin na //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa ma yin na //
translated: If things do not exist,

original: lta ba la sogs ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: lta ba la sogs ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How could seeing, etc. exist?

original: de phyir de dag snga rol na //
analyzed: de phyir de dag snga rol na //
translated: Therefore, prior to them,

original: dngos po gnas pa de yod do //
analyzed: dngos po gnas pa de yod do //
translated: The enduring thing exists.

original: 'di na lha sbyin yod par gyur pas nor sogs par byed kyi /
analyzed: 'di na lha sbyin yod par gyur pas nor sogs par byed kyi /
translated: Here, Devadatta, who exists, accumulates wealth,

original: yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bus ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bus ni ma yin no //
translated: but the barren woman’s son, who does not exist, does not.

original: de bzhin du gal te re zhig lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na gang zag gnas par ma gyur na ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te re zhig lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na gang zag gnas par ma gyur na ni /
translated: In the same way, if the person does not exist prior to seeing, etc.,

original: des lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len par byed par yang mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: des lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len par byed par yang mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: then he would not appropriate seeing, etc.

original: de phyir nor gyi snga rol na lha sbyin gnas pa ltar /
analyzed: de phyir nor gyi snga rol na lha sbyin gnas pa ltar /
translated: Therefore, just as Devadatta exists prior to the wealth,

original: lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na /
analyzed: lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na /
translated: prior to seeing, etc.🔽the person who appropriates them exists.

original: gang zhig 'di'i nye bar len par byed par @65b 'gyur ba'i gang zag de yod pa yin no zhes 'dzer to //🔽brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig 'di'i nye bar len par byed par @65b 'gyur ba'i gang zag de yod pa yin no zhes 'dzer to //🔽brjod par bya'o //
translated: This is what they say.

original: lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang // tshor ba la sogs nyid kyi ni //
analyzed: lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang // tshor ba la sogs nyid kyi ni //
translated: Prior to seeing, hearing, and so on, and feeling and so on,

original: snga rol dngos po gang gnas pa //
analyzed: snga rol dngos po gang gnas pa //
translated: what thing abides

original: de ni gang gis gdags par bya //
analyzed: de ni gang gis gdags par bya //
translated: that is called a person?

original: gang zag ces bya ba lta ba la sogs pa'i sngon rol na yod do zhes rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de gang yang gdags par bya /
analyzed: gang zag ces bya ba lta ba la sogs pa'i sngon rol na yod do zhes rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de gang yang gdags par bya /
translated: What thing that is called a person abides prior to seeing and so on?🔽It is not tenable to posit that it does.

original: 'di ltar gang zag tu tha snyad gdags pa'i rgyu ni lta ba la sogs pa yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang zag tu tha snyad gdags pa'i rgyu ni lta ba la sogs pa yin na /
translated: Why? The cause of the conventional designation of a person is seeing and so on.

original: de gal te de dag las sngar rnam par gnas par yod par rtog na ni /
analyzed: de gal te de dag las sngar rnam par gnas par yod par rtog na ni /
translated: If you imagine that it exists prior to them,

original: de'i tshe bum pa dang snam bu ltar /
analyzed: de'i tshe bum pa dang snam bu ltar /
translated: then like a pot or a cloth,

original: lta ba la sogs pa la ltos pa med par 'gyur la /
analyzed: lta ba la sogs pa la ltos pa med par 'gyur la /
translated: it would not depend on seeing and so on.

original: gang zhig rang gi rgyu la ltos pa med pa de ni rgyu med pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig rang gi rgyu la ltos pa med pa de ni rgyu med pa yin te /
translated: That which does not depend on its cause is causeless.

original: nod la sogs pa la mi ltos pa'i nor can ltar med pa yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //🔽gzhan yang lta ba la sogs med pa yang //
analyzed: nod la sogs pa la mi ltos pa'i nor can ltar med pa yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o // gzhan yang lta ba la sogs med pa yang //
translated: It would be nonexistent, like a sky flower or the child of a barren woman.🔽Moreover, if the person exists prior to seeing and so on,

original: gal te de ni gnas gyur na //
analyzed: gal te de ni gnas gyur na //
translated: then it would exist even without seeing and so on.

original: de med par yang de dag ni //
analyzed: de med par yang de dag ni //
translated: And without it, they would exist,

original: yod par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
analyzed: yod par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt.

original: gal te lta ba la sogs pa dag gi sngon rol na gang zag ces bya ba zhig yod pa des lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len par byed do snyam du sems na /
analyzed: gal te lta ba la sogs pa dag gi sngon rol na gang zag ces bya ba zhig yod pa des lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len par byed do snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that prior to seeing, etc., there is a so-called “person” who appropriates seeing, etc.,

original: de lta na ni the tshom med par lta ba la sogs pa 'di dag kyang gang zag med par yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni the tshom med par lta ba la sogs pa 'di dag kyang gang zag med par yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: then without a doubt, these seeing, etc., would exist without a person.

original: 'di ltar nor dang 'brel ba'i sngon rol na lha sbyin nor las tha dad par rnam par gnas par gyur nas nor so sor grub cing don gzhan du gyur pa sogs par byed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'di ltar nor dang 'brel ba'i sngon rol na lha sbyin nor las tha dad par rnam par gnas par gyur nas nor so sor grub cing don gzhan du gyur pa sogs par byed pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as prior to the connection with wealth, the person Devadatta, existing separately from wealth, would be established as a person who is already established as a separate individual, and would be connected with wealth.

original: nye bar len pa po la yang nye bar len pa lta ba la sogs pa rang las tha dad par don gzhan du gyur pa yod par 'gyur ba zhig go //
analyzed: nye bar len pa po la yang nye bar len pa lta ba la sogs pa rang las tha dad par don gzhan du gyur pa yod par 'gyur ba zhig go //
translated: In the same way, the appropriator would exist separately from the appropriated, such as seeing, etc., as a different object.

original: srid pa yang ma yin no zhes gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: srid pa yang ma yin no zhes gsungs pa ni /
translated: But this is not so.

original: ci yis gang zhig gsal bar byed //
analyzed: ci yis gang zhig gsal bar byed //
translated: By what is the person known?

original: gang gis ci zhig gsal bar byed //🔽ci med gang zhig ga la yod //
analyzed: gang gis ci zhig gsal bar byed // ci med gang zhig ga la yod //
translated: What is it that clarifies what?🔽How can there be a non-existent?

original: gang med ci zhig ga la yod //
analyzed: gang med ci zhig ga la yod //
translated: How can there be an existent?

original: ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ste /
translated: Here, it is said:

original: 'di na 'di ni 'di'i rgyu yin la /🔽'di ni 'di'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya bar sa bon zhes bya ba'i rgyus myu gu zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu gang zhig mngon par gsal bar byed cing /
analyzed: 'di na 'di ni 'di'i rgyu yin la / 'di ni 'di'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya bar sa bon zhes bya ba'i rgyus myu gu zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu gang zhig mngon par gsal bar byed cing /
translated: “This is the cause of that, and this is the result of that.”🔽In this way, by the cause called “seed,” what result called “sprout” is manifested?🔽And by that result, what cause called “seed” is manifested?🔽In the same way, if it is said, “This is the appropriator of that,” what self is manifested by the appropriation called “view” and so on?

original: 'bras bu des kyang sa bon zhes bya ba'i rgyu ci zhig mngon par gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du gal te 'di ni 'di'i nye bar len pa po'o zhes bya bar lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len pa ci zhig gi bdag gang zhig mngon par🔽gsal bar byed @66a * //
analyzed: 'bras bu des kyang sa bon zhes bya ba'i rgyu ci zhig mngon par gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du gal te 'di ni 'di'i nye bar len pa po'o zhes bya bar lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len pa ci zhig gi bdag gang zhig mngon par🔽gsal bar byed @66a * //
translated: And by what self is the appropriation called “view” and so on manifested?

original: cing / 'di ni 'di'i nye bar len pa'o zhes bya ba bdag gang gis lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len pa ci zhig mngon par gsal bar byed par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe phan tshun ltos nas nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po dag grub🔽par 'gyur na /
analyzed: cing / 'di ni 'di'i nye bar len pa'o zhes bya ba bdag gang gis lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len pa ci zhig mngon par gsal bar byed par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe phan tshun ltos nas nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po dag grub par 'gyur na /
translated: If the self were to manifest the appropriation of such things as seeing, then at that time the appropriator and that appropriated would be established in mutual dependence.

original: gang gi tshe nye bar len pa po med par logs shig tu lta ba la sogs pa khas len pa de'i tshe ni rten med pas de med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nye bar len pa po med par logs shig tu lta ba la sogs pa khas len pa de'i tshe ni rten med pas de med pa nyid yin no //
translated: But when you accept that such things as seeing exist separately without an appropriator, then at that time they would be baseless and nonexistent.

original: de'i phyir gnyi ga yang grub pa med pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyi ga yang grub pa med pas /
translated: Therefore, since neither exists,

original: lta ba la sogs pa las tha dad par nye bar len pa po gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: lta ba la sogs pa las tha dad par nye bar len pa po gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rigs so //
translated: it is illogical to say that the appropriator exists separately from such things as seeing.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here the opponent says:

original: lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la brjod par bya ste /
translated: With regard to what you said, such as “seeing, hearing, and so on,” we reply:

original: gal te lta ba la sogs pa thams cad kyi snga rol na gnas so zhes bya bar khas blangs par gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te lta ba la sogs pa thams cad kyi snga rol na gnas so zhes bya bar khas blangs par gyur na ni /
translated: If it were accepted that it exists prior to all such things as seeing,

original: nyes pa 'dir 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: nyes pa 'dir 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: then this error would ensue.🔽But it is not accepted that it exists prior to all such things as seeing.

original: gang gi tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe /
translated: For,

original: lta ba la sogs thams cad kyi //🔽snga rol gang zhig yod pa min //🔽'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: lta ba la sogs thams cad kyi // snga rol gang zhig yod pa min // 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: prior to all such things as seeing,🔽it does not exist.🔽But if it does not exist prior to each of them,

original: re re'i snga rol na yod pa yin no gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: re re'i snga rol na yod pa yin no gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: then how could it be the appropriator of those?

original: lta sogs nang nas gzhan zhig gis //
analyzed: lta sogs nang nas gzhan zhig gis //
translated: If it is made manifest by another,

original: gzhan gyi tshe na gsal bar byed //🔽gang gi tshe lta ba po zhes bya bar lta bas gsal bar byed pa de'i tshe ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe na gsal bar byed // gang gi tshe lta ba po zhes bya bar lta bas gsal bar byed pa de'i tshe ni /
translated: then it would be manifest even without them.

original: nyan pa la sogs pa dag la brten nas nye bar gdags par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan pa la sogs pa dag la brten nas nye bar gdags par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: If it is made manifest by seeing, which is called the “seer,” then it is not to be imputed in dependence on hearing and so on.

original: de'i phyir sngar smras pa'i nyes pa'i go skabs med do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir sngar smras pa'i nyes pa'i go skabs med do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the opportunity for the previously stated error does not exist.

original: brjod pa 'di yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod pa 'di yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: This statement is also unreasonable.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: lta ba la sogs pa dang bral ba ni nye bar len pa med pa /
analyzed: lta ba la sogs pa dang bral ba ni nye bar len pa med pa /
translated: Because it is devoid of seeing and so on, it does not exist.

original: rgyu med pa gsal byed dang bral ba ni yod pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu med pa gsal byed dang bral ba ni yod pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is causeless and unmanifested does not exist.🔽If prior to all

original: lta la sogs pa thams cad kyi //
analyzed: lta la sogs pa thams cad kyi //
translated: such as seeing, etc.🔽it does not exist,

original: snga rol gal te yod min na ste /🔽de ltar rtog na /
analyzed: snga rol gal te yod min na ste / de ltar rtog na /
translated: then in that case,

original: de lta na yang /🔽lta la sogs pa re re yi //
analyzed: de lta na yang / lta la sogs pa re re yi //
translated: even so,🔽how could it exist prior to each

original: snga rol de ni ji ltar yod //
analyzed: snga rol de ni ji ltar yod //
translated: such as seeing, etc.

original: gang zhig thams cad kyi snga rol na yod pa ma yin pa de ni re re'i snga rol na yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig thams cad kyi snga rol na yod pa ma yin pa de ni re re'i snga rol na yang ma yin te /
translated: That which does not exist prior to all does not exist prior to each,

original: dper na shing thams cad kyi snga rol na nags med pa de'i tshe re re'i snga rol na yang med la //
analyzed: dper na shing thams cad kyi snga rol na nags med pa de'i tshe re re'i snga rol na yang med la //
translated: just as a forest does not exist prior to each tree, and when it does not exist prior to each tree, it does not exist.

original: bye ma thams cad la til mar 'byin pa med la /
analyzed: bye ma thams cad la til mar 'byin pa med la /
translated: Oil does not come from all sands,

original: bye ma re re la yang til mar med pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bye ma re re la yang til mar med pa bzhin no //
translated: and oil does not come from each individual sand grain.

original: gzhan yang / gang zhig re re'i snga rol du yod par 'gyur ba de ni thams cad kyi snga rol na yang yod par khas blangs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang / gang zhig re re'i snga rol du yod par 'gyur ba de ni thams cad kyi snga rol na yang yod par khas blangs par 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, if it existed prior to each, then it would be accepted that it exists prior to all,

original: re re ma gtogs par thams cad med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: re re ma gtogs par thams cad med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all do not exist except for each.

original: de'i phyir @66b re re'i snga rol na yod do zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir @66b re re'i snga rol na yod do zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is illogical to say that it exists prior to each.

original: 'di'i phyir yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di'i phyir yang mi rigs te /
translated: For this reason also it is illogical.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because:

original: lta po de nyid nyan po de //
analyzed: lta po de nyid nyan po de //
translated: The seer itself is the hearer,

original: gal te tshor po'ang de nyid na //
analyzed: gal te tshor po'ang de nyid na //
translated: and if the feeler is the same,

original: de'i tshe / re re'i snga rol yod gyur na //
analyzed: de'i tshe / re re'i snga rol yod gyur na //
translated: then at that time, if it existed prior to each,

original: lta ba po gang yin pa de nyid nyan pa po yin no zhes bya bar brjod par ni rigs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: lta ba po gang yin pa de nyid nyan pa po yin no zhes bya bar brjod par ni rigs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: it is not logical to say that the seer itself is the hearer.

original: gal te yin na /
analyzed: gal te yin na /
translated: If it were so,

original: de'i tshe lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba'i nyan pa po yang lta ba po nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i tshe lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba'i nyan pa po yang lta ba po nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: then at that time, the hearer who is devoid of the action of seeing would also be the seer,

original: nyan pa'i bya ba dang bral ba'i lta ba po yang nyan pa por 'gyur na /
analyzed: nyan pa'i bya ba dang bral ba'i lta ba po yang nyan pa por 'gyur na /
translated: and the seer who is devoid of the action of hearing would also be the hearer.

original: lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba yang lta ba por 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba yang lta ba por 'gyur zhing /
translated: But that which is devoid of the action of seeing is not the seer,🔽and that which is devoid of the action of hearing is not the hearer.

original: nyan pa'i bya ba dang bral ba yang nyan pa por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gang yin pa de lta bu ni mthong ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan pa'i bya ba dang bral ba yang nyan pa por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gang yin pa de lta bu ni mthong ba yang ma yin no //
translated: That is not seen.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason:

original: de ni de ltar mi rigs so zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de ni de ltar mi rigs so zhes bshad do //
translated: That is not tenable.

original: bya ba so so la byed pa po tha dad pa'i phyir 'di ni de ltar yod par gal 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bya ba so so la byed pa po tha dad pa'i phyir 'di ni de ltar yod par gal 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that it is not tenable that the self exists in that way because the agent is different in each action,

original: de ni de ltar mi rigs so zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ni de ltar mi rigs so zhes gsungs so //
translated: he says, “That is not tenable.”

original: slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs ni /
analyzed: slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs ni /
translated: Ācārya Buddhapālita explains:

original: bdag gcig yin na ni /
analyzed: bdag gcig yin na ni /
translated: If the self were one,

original: dbang po gzhan la 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dbang po gzhan la 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: then it follows that it would go to another sense faculty

original: skyes bu skar khung gzhan du nye bar 'gro ba bzhin no zhes rnam par 'chad do //
analyzed: skyes bu skar khung gzhan du nye bar 'gro ba bzhin no zhes rnam par 'chad do //
translated: just as a person goes to another window.

original: slob dpon legs ldan byed ni /
analyzed: slob dpon legs ldan byed ni /
translated: Ācārya Bhāviveka says:🔽Since the self that exists in all does not go to another sense faculty, the error of the consequence does not make sense.

original: thams cad na yod pa'i bdag la dbang po gzhan la 'gro ba yod pa ma yin pas thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon mi rigs so zhes de la sun 'byin par smra'o //
analyzed: thams cad na yod pa'i bdag la dbang po gzhan la 'gro ba yod pa ma yin pas thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon mi rigs so zhes de la sun 'byin par smra'o //
translated: He says that this is the refutation.

original: 'di ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di ni mi rigs te /
translated: This is not correct.

original: rang gi sde pas brtags pa'i gang zag tu smra ba dgag pa'i skabs su bab pa'i phyir dang / de yang thams cad na yod pa nyid du khas ma 'ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi sde pas brtags pa'i gang zag tu smra ba dgag pa'i skabs su bab pa'i phyir dang / de yang thams cad na yod pa nyid du khas ma 'ches pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the occasion has come to refute the person propounded by our own Buddhist schools, and because they do not accept that it exists in all.

original: de'i phyir thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon rigs pa nyid do //🔽'on te yang ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon spang bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon rigs pa nyid do // 'on te yang ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon spang bar 'dod pas /
translated: Therefore, the fault of the reductio is not committed.🔽But if one wishes to avoid the faults just explained,

original: gal te lta po gzhan nyid la //🔽nyan pa po gzhan tshor gzhan na ste /
analyzed: gal te lta po gzhan nyid la // nyan pa po gzhan tshor gzhan na ste /
translated: then it is not tenable to say that🔽the seer is one thing, the hearer another,

original: rtog par byed na de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: rtog par byed na de yang mi rigs te /
translated: and the feeler still another.

original: de ltar 'dod par gyur na /
analyzed: de ltar 'dod par gyur na /
translated: If one maintained that,

original: lta po yod tshe nyan por 'gyur //
analyzed: lta po yod tshe nyan por 'gyur //
translated: then when the seer exists, the hearer would exist.

original: bdag kyang mang po nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: bdag kyang mang po nyid du 'gyur //
translated: And the self would be multiple.

original: ji ltar ba glang las gzhan du gyur pa'i rta ni ba glang yod pa'i tshe cig car du yod par mi 'gyur ba ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar ba glang las gzhan du gyur pa'i rta ni ba glang yod pa'i tshe cig car du yod par mi 'gyur ba ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as a horse that is different from an ox does not exist simultaneously with the ox,

original: gal te nyan pa po lta ba po las gzhan du gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te nyan pa po lta ba po las gzhan du gyur na ni /
translated: if the hearer were different from the seer,🔽then the hearer would not exist when the seer exists.

original: de lta ba po yod pa'i tsha na yang cig car du yod par 'gyur ba @67a * //
analyzed: de lta ba po yod pa'i tsha na yang cig car du yod par 'gyur ba @67a * //
translated: If the seer exists, then it would exist simultaneously with the seen.

original: zhig na / de ltar ni mi 'dod pas gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zhig na / de ltar ni mi 'dod pas gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But since that is not accepted, they are not different.

original: gzhan yang de lta yin na ni bdag mang por 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang de lta yin na ni bdag mang por 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, if that were so, the self would be multiple.

original: lta ba po dang nyan pa po dang tshor ba po la sogs pa rnams so so so sor grub par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lta ba po dang nyan pa po dang tshor ba po la sogs pa rnams so so so sor grub par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is accepted that the seer, the hearer, the feeler, and so on are established as distinct from one another.

original: de'i phyir / gang zag ces bya ba ni lta ba la sogs pa re re'i snga rol na yang 'ga' zhig kyang med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gang zag ces bya ba ni lta ba la sogs pa re re'i snga rol na yang 'ga' zhig kyang med do //
translated: Therefore, prior to each of seeing and so on, the so-called person does not exist in the least.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say,

original: bdag ni lta ba la sogs pa thams cad kyi snga rol na yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag ni lta ba la sogs pa thams cad kyi snga rol na yod pa nyid do //
translated: the self exists prior to all of seeing and so on.

original: ci ste gal te de yod na /
analyzed: ci ste gal te de yod na /
translated: If it exists,

original: de ni gang gis gdags par bya //
analyzed: de ni gang gis gdags par bya //
translated: by what is it imputed?

original: snyam du sems na /
analyzed: snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think this,

original: de la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de la brjod par bya ste /
translated: we reply:

original: 'di ltar lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na ming dang gzugs kyi gnas skabs na /
analyzed: 'di ltar lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na ming dang gzugs kyi gnas skabs na /
translated: In this way, prior to seeing and so on, in the state of name and form,

original: gang las rim gyis ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug go zhes lta ba dang nyan pa la sogs pa dag 'byung par 'gyur ba 'byung ba chen po bzhi yod de /
analyzed: gang las rim gyis ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug go zhes lta ba dang nyan pa la sogs pa dag 'byung par 'gyur ba 'byung ba chen po bzhi yod de /
translated: From which, in turn, the six sense bases arise in dependence on name and form.

original: de'i phyir lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na /
analyzed: de'i phyir lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na /
translated: Therefore, prior to seeing, hearing, etc.,

original: bdag 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i nye bar len pa can yod do //
analyzed: bdag 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i nye bar len pa can yod do //
translated: the self exists as appropriator of the four great elements.

original: de lta na yang /
analyzed: de lta na yang /
translated: But even so,

original: lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang // tshor ba dag la sogs pa yang //🔽gang las 'gyur ba'i 'byung de la'ang //
analyzed: lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang // tshor ba dag la sogs pa yang // gang las 'gyur ba'i 'byung de la'ang //
translated: seeing, hearing, etc., and feeling, etc.,🔽do not exist in the elements

original: de ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: from which they arise.

original: 'byung ba chen po gang dag las lta ba la sogs pa skye ba de dag la'ang /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po gang dag las lta ba la sogs pa skye ba de dag la'ang /
translated: The four great elements from which seeing, hearing, etc., arise

original: nye bar len pa 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu can 'di yod pa mi rigs te /🔽sngar bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kyis so zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: nye bar len pa 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu can 'di yod pa mi rigs te / sngar bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kyis so zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: do not have this appropriator of the four great elements as a cause,🔽because of the previously explained reasoning.

original: de la ji skad sngar /🔽ci med gang zhig ga la yod //
analyzed: de la ji skad sngar / ci med gang zhig ga la yod //
translated: In this regard, it was said previously:🔽How can that which does not exist

original: gang med ci zhig ga la yod //
analyzed: gang med ci zhig ga la yod //
translated: exist in that which does not exist?🔽How can that which does not exist🔽exist in that which exists?

original: ces bshad pa de kho na ltar 'dir yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ces bshad pa de kho na ltar 'dir yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: This should be stated here in the same way.

original: gal te nye bar len pa 'byung ba chen po'i snga rol du bdag grub par gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te nye bar len pa 'byung ba chen po'i snga rol du bdag grub par gyur na ni /
translated: If the self were established prior to the arising of the appropriated aggregates,

original: des 'byung ba chen po dag nye bar len par 'gyur na /
analyzed: des 'byung ba chen po dag nye bar len par 'gyur na /
translated: then it would appropriate the great elements.

original: de ltar yang ma yin te rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin te rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But that is not the case, because it would be causeless.

original: gang zhig yod pa ma yin pa de ni ji ltar 'byung ba chen po dag nye bar len par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang zhig yod pa ma yin pa de ni ji ltar 'byung ba chen po dag nye bar len par 'gyur /
translated: How could that which does not exist appropriate the great elements?

original: de'i phyir / lta ba'i nye bar len pa can ltar 'byung ba chen po'i nye bar len pa can la yang skyon brjod pa nyid yin pas slar yang ma brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir / lta ba'i nye bar len pa can ltar 'byung ba chen po'i nye bar len pa can la yang skyon brjod pa nyid yin pas slar yang ma brjod do //
translated: Therefore, since the error is the same for the appropriator of the great elements as it is for the appropriator of views, it is not stated again.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir 'di ni 'byung ba dag la yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir 'di ni 'byung ba dag la yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because that is so, therefore the self does not exist in the elements.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here the opponent says:

original: gal te yang de ltar bdag bkag mod kyi /
analyzed: gal te yang de ltar bdag bkag mod kyi /
translated: Even though the self has been refuted in this way,

original: 'on kyang lta ba la sogs pa ni yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'on kyang lta ba la sogs pa ni yod pa nyid de /
translated: seeing and so on do exist.

original: bkag pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bkag pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because they have not been refuted.

original: bum pa la sogs pa @67b bdag gi rang bzhin ma yin pa rnams la ni lta ba la sogs pa dang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa @67b bdag gi rang bzhin ma yin pa rnams la ni lta ba la sogs pa dang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But such things as a pot, which are not the self’s intrinsic reality, are not related to seeing, etc.

original: de'i phyir de dag dang 'brel pa can bdag yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag dang 'brel pa can bdag yod pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, since they are related to them, the self surely exists.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: gal te lta ba la sogs pa rnams nyid yod na /
analyzed: gal te lta ba la sogs pa rnams nyid yod na /
translated: If seeing, etc., existed,

original: bdag kyang yod par 'gyur na /
analyzed: bdag kyang yod par 'gyur na /
translated: the self would exist.

original: yod pa ni ma yin te /🔽lta ba la sogs pa bdag gang gi nye bar len pa yin pa de med do zhes bstan pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: yod pa ni ma yin te / lta ba la sogs pa bdag gang gi nye bar len pa yin pa de med do zhes bstan pa de'i tshe /
translated: But they do not exist.🔽It has been shown that the self of whatever seeing, etc., is a appropriated is nonexistent.

original: nye bar len pa po bdag med na lta ba la sogs pa /🔽nye bar len par gyur pa rnams //
analyzed: nye bar len pa po bdag med na lta ba la sogs pa / nye bar len par gyur pa rnams //
translated: When the appropriator, the self, does not exist,🔽how could seeing, etc.,

original: yod pa nyid du ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: yod pa nyid du ga la 'gyur //
translated: which are appropriated, exist?

original: zhes gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa ni /
translated: This is stated in the following:🔽Seeing, hearing, and so on,

original: lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang // tshor ba dag la sogs pa yang //🔽gang gi yin pa gal te med //
analyzed: lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang // tshor ba dag la sogs pa yang // gang gi yin pa gal te med //
translated: and feeling and so on,🔽if they are not of something,

original: de dag kyang ni yod ma yin //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang ni yod ma yin //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
translated: they cannot exist.

original: lta ba la sogs pa dag gang gi yin par rtog pa de gang gi tshe med do zhes bshad pa de'i tshe kho nar lta ba la sogs pa de yang med do zhes gsal bar bstan pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: lta ba la sogs pa dag gang gi yin par rtog pa de gang gi tshe med do zhes bshad pa de'i tshe kho nar lta ba la sogs pa de yang med do zhes gsal bar bstan pa ma yin nam /
translated: When it is explained that the self does not exist, then at that time it is clearly shown that seeing and so on do not exist.

original: de'i phyir lta ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir bdag med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir lta ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir bdag med do //
translated: Therefore, because seeing and so on do not exist, the self does not exist.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Objection:

original: ci bdag med do snyam du de ltar khyod kyis nges sam /
analyzed: ci bdag med do snyam du de ltar khyod kyis nges sam /
translated: Do you ascertain that the self does not exist in this way?

original: de skad sus smras /🔽lta ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de skad sus smras / lta ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Who says this?

original: bdag kyang med do zhes thal ma thag tu smras pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: bdag kyang med do zhes thal ma thag tu smras pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: We just said that because seeing and so on do not exist, the self also does not exist.

original: de skad du kho bo cag gis smras mod kyi /
analyzed: de skad du kho bo cag gis smras mod kyi /
translated: Reply: We did say this.

original: 'di'i don ni khyod kyis yang dag par gtan la ma phab pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i don ni khyod kyis yang dag par gtan la ma phab pa yin no //
translated: But you have not ascertained its meaning.

original: gang gi phyir bdag dngos po'i rang bzhin can yod do zhes brtags pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag dngos po'i rang bzhin can yod do zhes brtags pa yin la /
translated: Because the self is imputed to exist as the intrinsic reality of things,

original: de yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin zhing /
translated: it does not exist intrinsically.

original: bdag gis kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log gi gnyen por de la rang bzhin du mngon par zhen pa zlog par byed pa'i tshig smras pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log gi gnyen por de la rang bzhin du mngon par zhen pa zlog par byed pa'i tshig smras pa yin gyi /
translated: I also speak words that stop the attachment to intrinsic reality as the antidote to the unreal, erroneous attachment.

original: 'di'i dngos po med par brtags pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i dngos po med par brtags pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But I do not investigate the nonexistence of things.

original: 'di ltar 'di gnyis ni spang bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di gnyis ni spang bar bya ba yin te /
translated: Because these two are to be abandoned:

original: gang dngos po la mngon par zhen pa dang / gang yang dngos ngo med pa la mgon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: gang dngos po la mngon par zhen pa dang / gang yang dngos ngo med pa la mgon par zhen pa'o //
translated: attachment to things and attachment to the nonexistence of things.

original: ji skad du slob dpon 'phags pa'i ltas /
analyzed: ji skad du slob dpon 'phags pa'i ltas /
translated: As the master Āryasaṃmata says:

original: khyod kyi bdag kyang nga'i min //
analyzed: khyod kyi bdag kyang nga'i min //
translated: Your self is not mine.

original: des bdag nges med de phyir med //
analyzed: des bdag nges med de phyir med //
translated: Since it is not ascertained by that, it does not exist.

original: dngos po mi rtag pa rnams la //
analyzed: dngos po mi rtag pa rnams la //
translated: With regard to impermanent things,

original: rtog pa zhes kyang nye bar skye //
analyzed: rtog pa zhes kyang nye bar skye //
translated: the conception of permanence arises.

original: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that very point, he says:

original: gang zhig lta la sogs pa yi //
analyzed: gang zhig lta la sogs pa yi //
translated: Prior to seeing and so on,

original: snga rol da lta phyin med //🔽de la yod do med do zhes //🔽rtog @68a * //
analyzed: snga rol da lta phyin med // de la yod do med do zhes // rtog @68a * //
translated: it does not exist now or later.🔽With regard to that, the conceptions

original: pa dag ni ldog par 'gyur //
analyzed: pa dag ni ldog par 'gyur //
translated: of existence and nonexistence are stopped.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: So it is said.

original: re zhig lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na ni bdag med de /
analyzed: re zhig lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na ni bdag med de /
translated: First, the self does not exist prior to seeing, etc.,

original: de dang bral ba la yod pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang bral ba la yod pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would exist without them, and that is not tenable.

original: lta ba la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gyur pa yang med do //
analyzed: lta ba la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gyur pa yang med do //
translated: Nor does it exist simultaneously with seeing, etc.,

original: so so so sor ma grub pa dag la /🔽lhan cig pa nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / ri bong gi rva gnyis ltar phan tshun ltos pa med pa'i bdag dang nye bar blangs pa dag kyang so so so sor ma grub pa'i phyir da ltar yang med do //
analyzed: so so so sor ma grub pa dag la / lhan cig pa nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / ri bong gi rva gnyis ltar phan tshun ltos pa med pa'i bdag dang nye bar blangs pa dag kyang so so so sor ma grub pa'i phyir da ltar yang med do //
translated: because it is not seen to exist simultaneously with each individually.

original: phyis kyang med de /
analyzed: phyis kyang med de /
translated: Nor does it exist later, because it is not tenable that the self and appropriation exist separately, like the horns of a rabbit, and because they are not established individually.

original: 'di ltar gal te lta ba la sogs pa dag gong du yod par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te lta ba la sogs pa dag gong du yod par 'gyur zhing /
translated: If the self existed prior to seeing, etc.,

original: bdag 'og rol gyi dus su yod par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe phyis 'byung bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: bdag 'og rol gyi dus su yod par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe phyis 'byung bar 'gyur na /
translated: and existed later, then it would arise later.

original: de ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: But that is not the case.

original: byed pa po med pa'i las ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i las ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because an action without an agent is not established.

original: bdag gang zhig de ltar yongs su brtags pa na lta ba la sogs pa dag gi sngar ram phyis sam lhan cig yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /🔽dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin de la yod pa'am /
analyzed: bdag gang zhig de ltar yongs su brtags pa na lta ba la sogs pa dag gi sngar ram phyis sam lhan cig yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe / dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin de la yod pa'am /
translated: When the self is investigated in this way, it does not exist prior to, subsequent to, or simultaneously with seeing and so on.

original: med pa nyid du shes rab can su zhig rtog par byed /
analyzed: med pa nyid du shes rab can su zhig rtog par byed /
translated: At that time, what wise person would conceive of it as existent or nonexistent?

original: de'i phyir nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po gnyis las dang byed pa po bzhin du phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa nyid yin gyi //
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po gnyis las dang byed pa po bzhin du phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa nyid yin gyi //
translated: Therefore, like the appropriated and the appropriator, the agent and action are established in mutual dependence.🔽They do not exist inherently.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //🔽de nyid kyi phyir /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya bar gnas so // de nyid kyi phyir / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
translated: This is the point.

original: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo las /
analyzed: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo las /
translated: The Bhagavān also said in the noble King of Samādhis Sūtra:

original: de tshe sdig med stobs bcu ldan pa yi //
analyzed: de tshe sdig med stobs bcu ldan pa yi //
translated: At that time, the one who is free of sin, who possesses the ten powers,

original: rgyal ba de ni ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'chad //
analyzed: rgyal ba de ni ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'chad //
translated: the Victorious One taught this supreme samādhi.

original: srid pa'i 'gro ba rmi lam lta bu ste //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'gro ba rmi lam lta bu ste //
translated: The beings of cyclic existence are like a dream;

original: 'di la su yang mi skyo 'chi ba med //
analyzed: 'di la su yang mi skyo 'chi ba med //
translated: there is no one here who dies or is disheartened.

original: sems can ming dang srog kyang mi rnyed de //
analyzed: sems can ming dang srog kyang mi rnyed de //
translated: “Sentient beings and their life force cannot be found.

original: chos 'di rnams ni dbu ba chu shing 'dra //
analyzed: chos 'di rnams ni dbu ba chu shing 'dra //
translated: These phenomena are like foam and plantain trees.

original: sgyu ma lta bu nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste //
translated: They are like illusions, like lightning in the sky,

original: chu yi zla ba 'dra zhing smig rgyu bzhin //
analyzed: chu yi zla ba 'dra zhing smig rgyu bzhin //
translated: Like the moon in water, and like a mirage.

original: mi 'ga' 'jig rten 'dir yang shi nas ni //
analyzed: mi 'ga' 'jig rten 'dir yang shi nas ni //
translated: “When a person dies in this world,

original: 'jig rten gzhan du 'pho zhing 'gro med kyang //
analyzed: 'jig rten gzhan du 'pho zhing 'gro med kyang //
translated: They do not transfer and go to another world.

original: las byas rnams ni nam yang chud mi za //
analyzed: las byas rnams ni nam yang chud mi za //
translated: But the karma they have created is never lost.

original: 'khor ba na yang dkar nag 'bras bu smin //
analyzed: 'khor ba na yang dkar nag 'bras bu smin //
translated: The results of good and bad actions ripen in saṃsāra.

original: rtag pa ma yin chad par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: rtag pa ma yin chad par mi 'gyur te //
translated: “It is not eternal, nor does it end.

original: las bsags med cing gnas pa dag kyang med //
analyzed: las bsags med cing gnas pa dag kyang med //
translated: There is no accumulation of karma and no abiding in it.

original: de yang byas nas reg par mi 'gyur min //
analyzed: de yang byas nas reg par mi 'gyur min //
translated: But it is not the case that once created, karma does not touch you.

original: gzhan gyis byas pa tshor bar 'gyur ba'ang med //
analyzed: gzhan gyis byas pa tshor bar 'gyur ba'ang med //
translated: And it is not the case that what is done by one person is experienced by another.

original: 'pho ba med cing phyir yang 'ong ba med //
analyzed: 'pho ba med cing phyir yang 'ong ba med //
translated: “There is no transference and no return.

original: thams cad yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min //
analyzed: thams cad yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min //
translated: Everything is neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: 'di na lta gnas @68b 'jug pa dag pa min //
analyzed: 'di na lta gnas @68b 'jug pa dag pa min //
translated: Here, the views are not pure.

original: sems can spyod par bzhi 'jug pa med //
analyzed: sems can spyod par bzhi 'jug pa med //
translated: Sentient beings do not engage in the four kinds of conduct.

original: bde gshegs spyod yul rgyal ba'i yon tan ni //
analyzed: bde gshegs spyod yul rgyal ba'i yon tan ni //
translated: The domain of the Sugatas is the qualities of the Victorious Ones,

original: skye med zhi ba mtshan ma med pa'i gnas //
analyzed: skye med zhi ba mtshan ma med pa'i gnas //
translated: The abode of non-arising, peace, and the absence of marks.

original: stobs dang gzungs rnams dang ni stobs bcu'i stobs //
analyzed: stobs dang gzungs rnams dang ni stobs bcu'i stobs //
translated: The powers, the dhāraṇīs, and the power of the ten powers,

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas khyu mchog dam pa'i mchog / ces rgya cher gsungs so //🔽slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas khyu mchog dam pa'i mchog / ces rgya cher gsungs so // slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
translated: This is the supreme, excellent bull among the buddhas.

original: snga rol na gnas pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: snga rol na gnas pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This concludes the commentary to the ninth chapter, on the analysis of prior existence, in the Ornament of the Middle Way composed by the master Śāntarakṣita.

original: // /'dir smras pa /
analyzed: // /'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say,

original: nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po gnyis ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ni ma yin no zhes gang smras pa de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po gnyis ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ni ma yin no zhes gang smras pa de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: “It is illogical to say that the appropriator and that appropriated do not exist inherently,

original: dngos po ltos pa dang bcas pa rnams la yang ngo bo nyid dang bcas pa nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po ltos pa dang bcas pa rnams la yang ngo bo nyid dang bcas pa nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because things that are dependent are seen to have their own entities.”

original: 'di ltar bud shing la ltos nas me 'byung mod kyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar bud shing la ltos nas me 'byung mod kyi /
translated: In this way, fire arises in dependence on fuel,

original: me rang bzhin med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: me rang bzhin med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: but fire is not essenceless.

original: tsha ba dang sreg par byed pa nyid rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tsha ba dang sreg par byed pa nyid rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature and effect of burning and being burned are observed.

original: de bzhin du me la ltos nas bud shing yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de bzhin du me la ltos nas bud shing yin mod kyi /
translated: Likewise, fuel is in dependence on fire.

original: de rang bzhin med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de rang bzhin med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that it lacks an intrinsic nature,

original: bsreg par bya ba 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsreg par bya ba 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of the four great elements that are burned.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Likewise,

original: nye bar len pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar len pa po la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa yang ngo bo nyid yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nye bar len pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar len pa po la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa yang ngo bo nyid yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: the appropriator that is dependent on appropriation and the appropriation that is dependent on the appropriator would exist intrinsically.

original: de'i phyir med dang bud shing bzhin du nye bar len pa dang / nye bar len pa po de gnyis kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir med dang bud shing bzhin du nye bar len pa dang / nye bar len pa po de gnyis kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, like fire and fuel, those two—appropriation and the appropriator—would originate.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We say:

original: gal te me dang bud shing dag nyid yod na de ltar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te me dang bud shing dag nyid yod na de ltar 'gyur na /
translated: If fire and fuel existed, that would be the case.

original: yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But they do not exist.

original: 'dir gal te me dang bud shing dag yod par gyur na /
analyzed: 'dir gal te me dang bud shing dag yod par gyur na /
translated: Here, if fire and fuel existed,

original: de dag nges par gcig nyid dam tha dad pa nyid du yod par 'gyur grang /
analyzed: de dag nges par gcig nyid dam tha dad pa nyid du yod par 'gyur grang /
translated: They would definitely exist as either the same or different.

original: gnyi ga ltar yang mi rigs so zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang mi rigs so zhes gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that neither is correct:

original: bud shing gang de me yin na //
analyzed: bud shing gang de me yin na //
translated: If fuel were fire,

original: byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur //
translated: the agent and object would be the same.

original: gal te shing las me gzhan na //
analyzed: gal te shing las me gzhan na //
translated: If fire were different from fuel,🔽it would arise even without fuel.

original: shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur bud shing bsreg par bya ba shing la sogs pa las su gyur pa gang yin pa de'i sreg par byed pa po ni mi yin no //
analyzed: shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur bud shing bsreg par bya ba shing la sogs pa las su gyur pa gang yin pa de'i sreg par byed pa po ni mi yin no //
translated: The agent that burns is fire, and the object that is burned is fuel, such as wood.

original: de la gal te bud shing de nyid me yin no zhes bya bar rtog na ni de'i tshe byed pa po dang // las dag gcig nyid du 'gyur na /
analyzed: de la gal te bud shing de nyid me yin no zhes bya bar rtog na ni de'i tshe byed pa po dang // las dag gcig nyid du 'gyur na /
translated: If you imagine that fuel is fire, then the agent and object would be the same.

original: de ltar ni ma mthong ste /🔽rdza mkhan dang bum pa @69a * //
analyzed: de ltar ni ma mthong ste / rdza mkhan dang bum pa @69a * //
translated: But that is not seen.🔽It follows that the potter and the pot,

original: dag gam / gcad bya dang gcod pa po yang gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: dag gam / gcad bya dang gcod pa po yang gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir la /
translated: and the object cut and the cutter, would be the same.

original: de yang khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But that is unacceptable.

original: ci ste gzhan nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: ci ste gzhan nyid yin na ni /
translated: If they were different,

original: de lta na yang /
analyzed: de lta na yang /
translated: Nevertheless,🔽

original: gal te bud shing las me gzhan du gyur na /
analyzed: gal te bud shing las me gzhan du gyur na /
translated: But if fire were different from fuel,

original: de'i tshe bud shing la ltos pa med par mi dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe bud shing la ltos pa med par mi dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be observed without depending on fuel.

original: bum pa las gzhan du gyur pa'i snam bu ni de la ltos pa med par mthong ba ma yin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa las gzhan du gyur pa'i snam bu ni de la ltos pa med par mthong ba ma yin pa ma yin no //
translated: But a cloth that is different from a pot is not seen without depending on a pot.

original: bud shing la ltos pa med pa'i me ni de ltar yang ma yin pas /
analyzed: bud shing la ltos pa med pa'i me ni de ltar yang ma yin pas /
translated: But fire that does not depend on fuel is not like that.

original: 'di ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: 'di ni mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore this is illogical.

original: gzhan yang gal te bud shing las me gzhan du gyur na ni de'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te bud shing las me gzhan du gyur na ni de'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, if fire were different from fuel,

original: rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur //
translated: then it would always be burning.

original: 'bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung zhing //
analyzed: 'bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung zhing //
translated: It would not arise from a cause that ignites it,

original: rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur //
translated: and its activity would be pointless.

original: de lta yin na las kyang med //
analyzed: de lta yin na las kyang med //
translated: If that were so, then action would not exist.

original: me bud shing las tha dad par gyur par 'dod pa na rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: me bud shing las tha dad par gyur par 'dod pa na rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur zhing /
translated: When fire is asserted to be different from fuel, then it would always be burning.

original: 'bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung bar 'gyur la /
translated: It would not arise from a cause that ignites it.

original: yang rtsom pa don med par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: yang rtsom pa don med par 'gyur zhing /
translated: And its activity would be pointless.

original: de lta yin dang / las kyang med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin dang / las kyang med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then action would not exist.

original: don 'di nyid bstan par bzhed nas /
analyzed: don 'di nyid bstan par bzhed nas /
translated: Intending to teach just this point, [the master] says,

original: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it does not depend on another,

original: 'bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung zhing //
analyzed: 'bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung zhing //
translated: it does not arise from a cause of ignition.

original: rtag tu 'bar ba yin na ni //
analyzed: rtag tu 'bar ba yin na ni //
translated: If it were always burning,

original: rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur //🔽zhes bya bar gsungs so //🔽de la des 'bar bar byed pas na 'bar bar byed de bud shing ngo //
analyzed: rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur // zhes bya bar gsungs so // de la des 'bar bar byed pas na 'bar bar byed de bud shing ngo //
translated: then the undertaking would be pointless.🔽Here, ignition is fuel, because it ignites.

original: 'di la 'bar bar byed pa rgyur yod pas na 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las 'byung ba'o //🔽'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: 'di la 'bar bar byed pa rgyur yod pas na 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las 'byung ba'o // 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa ni /
translated: Since the cause of ignition exists in this [fire], it arises from a cause of ignition.

original: 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: Not arising from a cause of ignition is not arising from a cause of ignition.

original: gal te 'bar bar byed pa las me gzhan yin par gyur na ni de'i tshe bud shing la ltos pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'bar bar byed pa las me gzhan yin par gyur na ni de'i tshe bud shing la ltos pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If fire were different from ignition, then it would not depend on fuel.

original: gang zhig gang las gzhan yin pa de ni ltos pa med de /
analyzed: gang zhig gang las gzhan yin pa de ni ltos pa med de /
translated: That which is different from something else does not depend on it,

original: bum pa dang snam bu bzhin no //
analyzed: bum pa dang snam bu bzhin no //
translated: like a pot and a cloth.

original: de'i phyir gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because it is not dependent on another, it would not arise from a cause that sets it on fire.

original: de'i phyir rtag tu 'bar bar byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtag tu 'bar bar byed do //
translated: Therefore, it would always be on fire.

original: 'bar bar byed pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i me de ni med na 'chi bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'bar bar byed pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i me de ni med na 'chi bar 'gyur na /
translated: But if fire, which is dependent on being set on fire, does not exist, it would go out.

original: gang gi tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe /
translated: When

original: 'bar bar byed pa la ltos pa med pa de'i tshe ni 'chi ba'i rkyen ma tshang bas rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bar bar byed pa la ltos pa med pa de'i tshe ni 'chi ba'i rkyen ma tshang bas rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: it is not dependent on being set on fire, then because the conditions for going out are incomplete, it would always be on fire.

original: rtag tu 'bar ba yin na ni //
analyzed: rtag tu 'bar ba yin na ni //
translated: If it were always on fire,

original: mi 'chi bar bya ba'i phyir de nye bar len pa dang spar ba la sogs pa'i rtsom pa @69b don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'chi bar bya ba'i phyir de nye bar len pa dang spar ba la sogs pa'i rtsom pa @69b don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then the effort to light it and to fan it would be pointless, in order to keep it from going out.

original: de lta yin na me las med cing mi bdog pa yin bzhin du byed pa por yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na me las med cing mi bdog pa yin bzhin du byed pa por yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then fire would be an agent even though it does not exist and is not present.

original: las yod pa ma yin pa ni byed pa po nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: las yod pa ma yin pa ni byed pa po nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: But that which does not exist as an action is not even an agent,

original: mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no //
translated: like the son of a barren woman.

original: de'i phyir bud shing las me gzhan pa nyid kyang mi rigs so //🔽'dir smras pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bud shing las me gzhan pa nyid kyang mi rigs so // 'dir smras pa /
translated: Therefore, it is also illogical for fire to be different from fuel.🔽 Objection:

original: gang 'di skad du /
analyzed: gang 'di skad du /
translated: In this regard, it was said:

original: gal te shing las me gzhan na //
analyzed: gal te shing las me gzhan na //
translated: If fire were different from fuel,

original: shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: It would arise without fuel.

original: zhes gang smras pa de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: zhes gang smras pa de ni mi rigs te /
translated: This is illogical.

original: 'dir me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid yin yang /
analyzed: 'dir me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid yin yang /
translated: In this regard, although fire and fuel are different,

original: bud shing med par me yod pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: bud shing med par me yod pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: fire does not exist without fuel.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'bar bar gyur pa'i don mes bsreg par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can ni bud shing yin la /
analyzed: 'bar bar gyur pa'i don mes bsreg par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can ni bud shing yin la /
translated: Fuel has the characteristic of being that which is burned by fire.

original: me yang de la brten nas dmigs kyi /
analyzed: me yang de la brten nas dmigs kyi /
translated: Fire is observed in dependence on that.

original: so sor ni ma yin no //
analyzed: so sor ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not observed separately.

original: gang gi tshe /🔽de ltar me dang 'brel pa las bud shing du brjod par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gang gi tshe / de ltar me dang 'brel pa las bud shing du brjod par 'gyur zhing /
translated: When fuel is called fuel🔽in dependence on fire,🔽and fire is observed in dependence on fuel,🔽not separately,

original: me yang bud shing la brten nas dmigs kyi so sor ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: me yang bud shing la brten nas dmigs kyi so sor ma yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: then fire and fuel🔽are not tenable as different.

original: gal te shing las me gzhan na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nyes par thal ba'i go skabs med do zhe na phyogs 'di yang mi rigs pa nyid du brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te shing las me gzhan na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nyes par thal ba'i go skabs med do zhe na phyogs 'di yang mi rigs pa nyid du brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you say that the error of the consequence, “If fire were different from fuel,” etc., does not arise, this position is also illogical.

original: de la gal te 'di snyam du /
analyzed: de la gal te 'di snyam du /
translated: In response to this, the treatise states:

original: bsreg bzhin bud shing yin sems na //
analyzed: bsreg bzhin bud shing yin sems na //
translated: If you think that what is burning is fuel,

original: gang tshe de tsam de yin na //
analyzed: gang tshe de tsam de yin na //
translated: when that is just that,

original: gang gis bud shing de sreg byed //🔽ces bya ba gsungs te ;🔽gal te 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i don bsreg par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can ni bud shing yin la /
analyzed: gang gis bud shing de sreg byed // ces bya ba gsungs te ; gal te 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i don bsreg par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can ni bud shing yin la /
translated: by what is that fuel burned?

original: me ni de'i rten can yin no snyam du sems na /
analyzed: me ni de'i rten can yin no snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that the object endowed with blazing is characterized by being that which is burned, and that fire is based on that,

original: de ltar brtags kyang /
analyzed: de ltar brtags kyang /
translated: even if you imagine it in this way,

original: mes bud shing bsreg go zhes bya ba mi 'thad de /
analyzed: mes bud shing bsreg go zhes bya ba mi 'thad de /
translated: it is not tenable to say that fire burns fuel.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Why is this?🔽The text states:

original: gang tshe de tsam de yin na //
analyzed: gang tshe de tsam de yin na //
translated: When that is just that,

original: gang gis bud shing de sreg byed //🔽ces bya ba 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gang gis bud shing de sreg byed // ces bya ba 'byung ngo //
translated: by what is that fuel burned?

original: gang tshe de tsam de yin na //
analyzed: gang tshe de tsam de yin na //
translated: When that is just that,

original: zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bsreg bzhin pa tsam zhig de yin pa na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bsreg bzhin pa tsam zhig de yin pa na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of “just as it is being burned.”

original: 'dir mes bud shing bsreg go zhes rtog pa na /
analyzed: 'dir mes bud shing bsreg go zhes rtog pa na /
translated: Here, when one conceives of fuel as being burned by fire,

original: bud shing ni 'bar bar gyur pa bsreg par bya ba yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: bud shing ni 'bar bar gyur pa bsreg par bya ba yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then fuel would be that which is being burned, that is, that which is flaming.

original: 'di las ma gtogs par gang gis bud shing sreg par byed pa'i me gzhan ni ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di las ma gtogs par gang gis bud shing sreg par byed pa'i me gzhan ni ma mthong ngo //
translated: But apart from this, we do not see any fire that burns fuel.

original: de'i phyir 'di tsam zhig tu gyur pa 'di nye bar dmigs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di tsam zhig tu gyur pa 'di nye bar dmigs te /
translated: Therefore, only this much is observed:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: That is,

original: 'bar bar gyur pa'i bsreg par bya ba tsam mo //
analyzed: 'bar bar gyur pa'i bsreg par bya ba tsam mo //
translated: just the fuel that is being burned.

original: gang gi tshe de las tha dad pa'i me yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe bud shing de gang gis @70a * //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de las tha dad pa'i me yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe bud shing de gang gis @70a * //
translated: When fire is not different from that, then what fuel

original: sreg par byed /
analyzed: sreg par byed /
translated: could fire burn?

original: de'i phyir mes bud shing mi bsreg ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir mes bud shing mi bsreg ste /
translated: Therefore, fire does not burn fuel,

original: de las ma gtogs pa'i me med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las ma gtogs pa'i me med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because apart from that there is no fire.

original: gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe 'bar bar gyur pa 'ga' zhig kyang ga la yod de /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe 'bar bar gyur pa 'ga' zhig kyang ga la yod de /
translated: When this is so, then how could there be any flaming?

original: de'i phyir nyes pa de nyid bzlog tu med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyes pa de nyid bzlog tu med do //
translated: Therefore, that fault cannot be averted.

original: gzhan yang me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid du khas len na /
analyzed: gzhan yang me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid du khas len na /
translated: Moreover, if fire and fuel are accepted as different,

original: bsreg bzhin pa'i brjod pa med pas /
analyzed: bsreg bzhin pa'i brjod pa med pas /
translated: since that which is being burned is not expressed,

original: bsreg bzhin pa bud shing dug la 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: bsreg bzhin pa bud shing dug la 'gyur zhing /
translated: that which is being burned would be fuel.🔽How could fire burn fuel?

original: mes bud shing bsreg par yang ga la 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mes bud shing bsreg par yang ga la 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: To demonstrate this, it is said:🔽Since they are different, they do not contact each other.

original: gzhan phyir mi phrad phrad med na //🔽sreg par mi 'gyur mi sreg na //
analyzed: gzhan phyir mi phrad phrad med na // sreg par mi 'gyur mi sreg na //
translated: If they do not contact each other,🔽they will not burn. If they do not burn,

original: 'chi bar mi 'gyur mi 'chi na //🔽rang rtags dang yang ldan par gnas //
analyzed: 'chi bar mi 'gyur mi 'chi na // rang rtags dang yang ldan par gnas //
translated: they will not be extinguished. If they are not extinguished,

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: they will remain with their own characteristics.

original: gal te bud shing las me gzhan du gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te bud shing las me gzhan du gyur na ni /
translated: If fire were different from fuel,

original: de gzhan yin pa'i phyir snang ba dang mun pa ltar bud shing dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gzhan yin pa'i phyir snang ba dang mun pa ltar bud shing dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: since it would be different, like light and darkness, it would not contact fuel.

original: phrad pa med pa'i phyir bsreg par yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: phrad pa med pa'i phyir bsreg par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: Since there is no contact, it would not burn,

original: bskal pa'i yul na gnas pa bzhin no snyam du dgongs so //
analyzed: bskal pa'i yul na gnas pa bzhin no snyam du dgongs so //
translated: like something located in a different world system.

original: de ltar na bsreg bzhin pa bud shing yin no zhes bya ba mi 'thad pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na bsreg bzhin pa bud shing yin no zhes bya ba mi 'thad pa nyid do //
translated: Thus, it is not tenable to say, “That which is being burned is fuel.”

original: de'i phyir me 'chi bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir me 'chi bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, fire would not go out.

original: mi 'chi na yang rang gi rtags dang ldan pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi 'chi na yang rang gi rtags dang ldan pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: And if it did not go out, it would endure possessing its own characteristics.

original: rab tu 'bar zhing zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rab tu 'bar zhing zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The term “blazing” means “burning.”

original: yang gi sgra ni rang gi rtags dang ldan pa kho nar gnas par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni rang gi rtags dang ldan pa kho nar gnas par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: The term “also” should be regarded as having the sense of “only” or “exclusively.”

original: yang na bud shing las me gzhan du gyur pa nyid med do zhes nges par bzung ba 'am rnam par rtog pa'i don du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na bud shing las me gzhan du gyur pa nyid med do zhes nges par bzung ba 'am rnam par rtog pa'i don du blta bar bya'o //
translated: Or, it should be regarded as having the sense of “determining” or “specifying,” as in “Fire is not different from fuel.”

original: yang na gzhan yin pa'i phyir mi phrad pa dang / phrad pa med na bsreg par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi bsreg na 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mi 'chi na rang gi rtags dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na gzhan yin pa'i phyir mi phrad pa dang / phrad pa med na bsreg par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi bsreg na 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mi 'chi na rang gi rtags dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, it should be regarded as having the sense of “summarizing,” as in “Because they are different, they do not make contact, and if they do not make contact, they are not burned, and if they are not burned, they do not go out, and if they do not go out, they endure possessing their own characteristics.”

original: de'i phyir bud shing las me gzhan nyid du yang mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir bud shing las me gzhan nyid du yang mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is also illogical for fire to be different from fuel.

original: 'dir smras pa /🔽me dang bud shing dag gzhan yin na gzhan phyir mi phrad phrad med na //
analyzed: 'dir smras pa / me dang bud shing dag gzhan yin na gzhan phyir mi phrad phrad med na //
translated: Objection:

original: bsreg par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: bsreg par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de ni mi rigs te /
translated: If fire and fuel are different, then it is illogical to say, “Because they are different, they do not make contact, and if they do not make contact, they cannot be burned.”

original: 'di ltar skyes pa dang / bud med dag gzhan nyid yin yang phrad par mthong ba yin la //
analyzed: 'di ltar skyes pa dang / bud med dag gzhan nyid yin yang phrad par mthong ba yin la //
translated: Because it is seen that men and women, though different, make contact.

original: me dang bud shing dag kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me dang bud shing dag kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: Fire and fuel are also like that.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: In response, Aryadeva says:🔽Just as a man makes contact with a woman

original: ji ltar bud med skyes pa dang // skyes pa'ang bud med phrad pa @70b bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar bud med skyes pa dang // skyes pa'ang bud med phrad pa @70b bzhin //
translated: And a woman makes contact with a man,

original: gal te shing las me gzhan na //
analyzed: gal te shing las me gzhan na //
translated: If fire were different from fuel,

original: shing dang phrad par rung bar 'gyur //🔽gal te me dang bud shing dag skyes pa dang bud med ltar /
analyzed: shing dang phrad par rung bar 'gyur // gal te me dang bud shing dag skyes pa dang bud med ltar /
translated: It would make contact with fuel.🔽If fire and fuel were established without mutual dependence,

original: phan tshun ltos pa med par grub par gyur na ni /
analyzed: phan tshun ltos pa med par grub par gyur na ni /
translated: like a man and a woman,

original: de de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: de de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: then that would be the case.

original: gyur pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: gyur pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa ni /
translated: But that is not the case.

original: gal te me dang shing dag ni //
analyzed: gal te me dang shing dag ni //
translated: If fire and fuel

original: gcig gis gcig ni bsal gyur na //🔽shing las me gzhan nyid yin yang //
analyzed: gcig gis gcig ni bsal gyur na // shing las me gzhan nyid yin yang //
translated: were mutually exclusive,🔽then even though fire would be different from fuel,🔽it would still contact fuel.

original: shing dang phrad par 'dod la rag / ces bya ba ste bud shing la ltos pa med par me yod par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: shing dang phrad par 'dod la rag / ces bya ba ste bud shing la ltos pa med par me yod par 'gyur zhing /
translated: It is impossible for fire to exist without depending on fuel,

original: me la mi ltos par bud shing yod par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu ni mi srid do //
analyzed: me la mi ltos par bud shing yod par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu ni mi srid do //
translated: and it is impossible for fuel to exist without depending on fire.

original: de'i phyir dpe 'di ni don med pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe 'di ni don med pa yin te /
translated: Therefore this example is meaningless.

original: gzhan nyid yin yang phan tshun ltos pa la rag las te /
analyzed: gzhan nyid yin yang phan tshun ltos pa la rag las te /
translated: Even though they are different, they are still dependent on each other.

original: skyes par gyur pa gang dag phrad par grub pa de dag nyid dpe nye bar dgod par rigs par 'gyur na /
analyzed: skyes par gyur pa gang dag phrad par grub pa de dag nyid dpe nye bar dgod par rigs par 'gyur na /
translated: It would be reasonable to cite as an example only those things that are established as coming into contact after they have arisen.

original: de dag kyang yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: de dag kyang yod pa ma yin pas /
translated: But since they do not exist,

original: gzhan nyid yin bzhin du phrad pa yod do zhes bya ba mi rigs so //
analyzed: gzhan nyid yin bzhin du phrad pa yod do zhes bya ba mi rigs so //
translated: it is unreasonable to say that different things come into contact.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Objection:

original: gal te yang me dang bud shing dag la skyes pa dang bud med ltar phan tshun ltos pa med par grub pa med mod kyi /
analyzed: gal te yang me dang bud shing dag la skyes pa dang bud med ltar phan tshun ltos pa med par grub pa med mod kyi /
translated: Even though fire and fuel are not established without mutual dependence, like a man and a woman,

original: de lta na yang phan tshun ltos pa ni re zhig yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang phan tshun ltos pa ni re zhig yod pa yin no //
translated: Still, they are mutually dependent.

original: phan tshun ltos pa de'i phyir me dang bud shing dag gi rang gi ngo bo grub pa ni yod pa yin te /
analyzed: phan tshun ltos pa de'i phyir me dang bud shing dag gi rang gi ngo bo grub pa ni yod pa yin te /
translated: Because they are mutually dependent, the intrinsic reality of fire and fuel is established as existent.

original: yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bu dang bu mo dag ni phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bu dang bu mo dag ni phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du ma mthong ngo //
translated: For it is not seen that the nonexistent son of a barren woman and a girl of the same type are mutually dependent.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: de lta na yang /🔽gal te shing ltos me yin la //
analyzed: de lta na yang / gal te shing ltos me yin la //
translated: Even so,🔽if fire is dependent on fuel,

original: gal te me ltos shing yin na //
analyzed: gal te me ltos shing yin na //
translated: and if fuel is dependent on fire,

original: gang ltos me dang shing 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang ltos me dang shing 'gyur ba //
translated: what is fire and fuel that are mutually dependent?

original: dang por grub pa gang zhig yin //🔽gal te me 'di ni bud shing 'di'i sreg par byed pa'i byed pa po yin no zhes de ltar bud shing la ltos nas mer rnam par 'jog cing /
analyzed: dang por grub pa gang zhig yin // gal te me 'di ni bud shing 'di'i sreg par byed pa'i byed pa po yin no zhes de ltar bud shing la ltos nas mer rnam par 'jog cing /
translated: What is the first established thing?🔽If fire is posited as fire in dependence on fuel, thinking “This fire is the agent of the burning of this fuel,”

original: gal te bud shing 'di ni me 'di'i las yin no zhes de ltar me la ltos te /
analyzed: gal te bud shing 'di ni me 'di'i las yin no zhes de ltar me la ltos te /
translated: and if fuel is posited as fuel in dependence on fire, thinking “This fuel is the object of the action of this fire,”

original: bud shing rnam par 'jog pa de'i tshe de gnyis las sngar grub pa gang zhig yin /🔽ci bud shing la ltos nas mer 'gyur ram /
analyzed: bud shing rnam par 'jog pa de'i tshe de gnyis las sngar grub pa gang zhig yin / ci bud shing la ltos nas mer 'gyur ram /
translated: When you posit fuel, which of the two is established first?🔽Does fire become fuel in dependence on fuel?

original: 'on te me la ltos te bud shing du 'gyur /
analyzed: 'on te me la ltos te bud shing du 'gyur /
translated: Or does fuel become fuel in dependence on fire?

original: de la gal te bud shing dang por grub po zhes rtog na ni /
analyzed: de la gal te bud shing dang por grub po zhes rtog na ni /
translated: If you think that fuel is established first,

original: de ni mi rigs te me la ltos pa med cing bsreg bzhin pa ma yin pa ni bud shing nyid ma yin pa'i phyir dang / rtsva la sogs pa thams cad kyang bud shing nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //🔽ci ste dang por me @71a * //
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te me la ltos pa med cing bsreg bzhin pa ma yin pa ni bud shing nyid ma yin pa'i phyir dang / rtsva la sogs pa thams cad kyang bud shing nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // ci ste dang por me @71a * //
translated: that is illogical, because that which is not fire and is not being burned is not fuel, and it follows that all grass and so on would be fuel.🔽If you say that fire is not established first,

original: yin la phyis bud shing yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yin la phyis bud shing yin no zhe na /
translated: but later becomes fuel,

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: that is also illogical,

original: bud shing las sngar grub pa'i me med pa'i phyir dang / rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / phyis ltos pa dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bud shing las sngar grub pa'i me med pa'i phyir dang / rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / phyis ltos pa dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because without fire established prior to fuel, it follows that fire would be without a cause, and later reliance on fuel would be pointless.

original: de'i phyir 'dir gang la ltos nas cig shos 'grub par 'gyur ba dang por grub pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir gang la ltos nas cig shos 'grub par 'gyur ba dang por grub pa gang yang med do //
translated: Therefore, in this context, there is nothing that is established first in dependence on which the other is established.

original: ci ste yang sngar bud shing yin la phyis me yin no snyam du sems na /
analyzed: ci ste yang sngar bud shing yin la phyis me yin no snyam du sems na /
translated: But if you think that something is fuel prior to being fire,

original: de lta na yang /
analyzed: de lta na yang /
translated: then in that case as well,

original: gal te shing ltos me yin na //
analyzed: gal te shing ltos me yin na //
translated: If fire relies on fuel,

original: me grub pa la sgrub par 'gyur //
analyzed: me grub pa la sgrub par 'gyur //
translated: it would be established in dependence on what is to be established.

original: gal te bud shing la ltos nas mer 'gyur ro zhes rtog na /
analyzed: gal te bud shing la ltos nas mer 'gyur ro zhes rtog na /
translated: If you think that fire relies on fuel,

original: de ltar na 'o na me grub zin pa la yang bsgrub par 'gyur te /
