analyzed: de ltar na 'o na me grub zin pa la yang bsgrub par 'gyur te /
translated: then in that case, fire would be established in dependence on what is to be established.

original: dngos po yod cing grub pa'i ngo bo can kho na ltos par rigs kyi //
analyzed: dngos po yod cing grub pa'i ngo bo can kho na ltos par rigs kyi //
translated: It is only a thing that exists and has an established nature that can rely on something else.

original: yod pa ma yin pa'i lha sbyin ni khyim 'ga' la yang ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa'i lha sbyin ni khyim 'ga' la yang ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that nonexistent Devadatta relies on any house.

original: gal te de ltar me yod par ma gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te de ltar me yod par ma gyur na ni /
translated: If fire did not exist,

original: de bud shing la ltos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bud shing la ltos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not rely on fuel.

original: de'i phyir me yod par khas blang bar bya dgos la ;
analyzed: de'i phyir me yod par khas blang bar bya dgos la ;
translated: Therefore, you must accept that fire exists.

original: de'i tshe na yang 'di bud shing la ltos pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de'i tshe na yang 'di bud shing la ltos pas ci zhig bya /
translated: But at that time, what use is it for fire to rely on fuel?

original: gang gi don du bud shing la ltos pa 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ba grub zin pa'i me ni yang bud shing gis byar med do //
analyzed: gang gi don du bud shing la ltos pa 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ba grub zin pa'i me ni yang bud shing gis byar med do //
translated: Fire that has already been established as having a result in dependence on fuel does not need to be made by fuel again.

original: de'i phyir bud shing la ltos nas mer 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir bud shing la ltos nas mer 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is illogical to say, “Fire comes to be in dependence on fuel.”

original: gang yang gal te bud shing la brten nas mer 'gyur ro zhes rtog na /
analyzed: gang yang gal te bud shing la brten nas mer 'gyur ro zhes rtog na /
translated: Moreover, if you think, “Fire comes to be in dependence on fuel,”

original: de lta yin na /🔽bud par bya ba'i shing la yang //
analyzed: de lta yin na / bud par bya ba'i shing la yang //
translated: then in that case,🔽fuel would also come to be

original: me med par ni 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: me med par ni 'gyur ba yin //
translated: without fire.

original: gal te bud shing grub par ma gyur na ni de la me mi ltos pa nyid de /
analyzed: gal te bud shing grub par ma gyur na ni de la me mi ltos pa nyid de /
translated: If fuel were not established, it would not depend on fire,

original: ma grub pa la ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa la ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is illogical for that which is not established to depend on something.

original: de'i phyir bud shing me med par grub par khas blang bar bya bar 'gyur na de ni de lta bu yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bud shing me med par grub par khas blang bar bya bar 'gyur na de ni de lta bu yang ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, you would have to accept that fuel is established without fire, but that is not the case.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is not tenable.🔽But if fire is established by the establishment of fuel,

original: ci ste dus gcig kho nar bud shing 'grub pas me 'grub cing /
analyzed: ci ste dus gcig kho nar bud shing 'grub pas me 'grub cing /
translated: and fuel is established by the establishment of fire,🔽then both of them are established without depending on each other.

original: me 'grub pas kyang bud shing 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: me 'grub pas kyang bud shing 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: Also, fire would be established by fuel.

original: de'i phyir / gcig kyang sngar grub par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gcig kyang sngar grub par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir //
translated: But since you do not accept that either is established earlier,🔽What is the fire that depends on fuel?

original: gang ltos me dang shing 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang ltos me dang shing 'gyur ba //
translated: What is the fuel that depends on fire?🔽If you accept that, then it is not tenable to say:

original: dang por grub pa gang zhig yin //
analyzed: dang por grub pa gang zhig yin //
translated: What is the first that is established?🔽What is the fire that depends on fuel?🔽What is the fuel that depends on fire?

original: zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rigs so zhes 'dod na /
analyzed: zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rigs so zhes 'dod na /
translated: If you accept that, then it is not tenable that both are established.

original: brjod par bya ste /🔽de ltar 'dod na ni yang gnyi ga grub pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste / de ltar 'dod na ni yang gnyi ga grub pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Why? Because:

original: 'di ltar / gal te dngos po gang ltos 'grub //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te dngos po gang ltos 'grub //
translated: If any thing is established in dependence on another,

original: de nyid la yang ltos nas ni //🔽ltos bya gang yin de 'grub na /
analyzed: de nyid la yang ltos nas ni // ltos bya gang yin de 'grub na /
translated: Then depending on what would that thing🔽That is dependent for its establishment

original: @71b gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub //🔽de la gal te me zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig la ltos nas 'grub la /
analyzed: @71b gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub // de la gal te me zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig la ltos nas 'grub la /
translated: Be established?

original: bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po bdag nyid grub par bya ba'i phyir ltos par bya bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de /
analyzed: bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po bdag nyid grub par bya ba'i phyir ltos par bya bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de /
translated: In that regard, if any thing called “fire” is established in dependence on any thing called “fuel,” and that which is dependent for its establishment on itself, the thing called “fuel,”

original: gal te me zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig la ltos nas 'grub na /
analyzed: gal te me zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig la ltos nas 'grub na /
translated: If the thing called “fire” is established in reliance on something,🔽now state what is established in reliance on what?

original: da ni gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba smros shig / gal te me med pa na bud shing 'grub pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: da ni gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba smros shig / gal te me med pa na bud shing 'grub pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If the thing called “fuel” is not established when fire does not exist,

original: rgyu med pas bud shing med pa'i phyir de'i rgyu can gyi me 'grub par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rgyu med pas bud shing med pa'i phyir de'i rgyu can gyi me 'grub par ga la 'gyur /
translated: then since fuel would not exist without a cause, how could fire, which is caused by it, be established?

original: de bzhin du gal te bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig /
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig /
translated: In the same way, if the thing called “fuel”

original: me zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig la ltos nas 'grub la /🔽me zhes bya ba'i dngos po bud shing gi bdag nyid 'grub par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: me zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig la ltos nas 'grub la / me zhes bya ba'i dngos po bud shing gi bdag nyid 'grub par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: is established in reliance on the thing called “fire,”🔽and if the thing called “fire” is established in reliance on the thing called “fuel,”

original: ltos par bya bar grub pa gang yin pa de yang gal te bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po de nyid ltos nas 'grub na /
analyzed: ltos par bya bar grub pa gang yin pa de yang gal te bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po de nyid ltos nas 'grub na /
translated: then that which is established in reliance on the thing called “fuel”

original: da ni gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba brjod par bya dgos so //
analyzed: da ni gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba brjod par bya dgos so //
translated: must be stated as that which is established in reliance on what?

original: gal te bud shing med pa na me 'grub pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe rgyu med pas me med pa'i phyir de'i rgyu can gyi bud shing yod par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te bud shing med pa na me 'grub pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe rgyu med pas me med pa'i phyir de'i rgyu can gyi bud shing yod par ga la 'gyur /
translated: But if fire is not established in the absence of fuel, and it does not exist, then since fire does not exist without a cause, how could fuel that is its cause exist?

original: 'di'i phyir yang me dang bud shing dag phan tshun ltos nas grub pa med de /
analyzed: 'di'i phyir yang me dang bud shing dag phan tshun ltos nas grub pa med de /
translated: For this reason, fire and fuel are not established in mutual dependence.

original: grub pa dang ma grub pa dag ltos pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: grub pa dang ma grub pa dag ltos pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: To demonstrate that, he says:

original: dngos po ltos grub gang yin pa //🔽de ma grub na ji ltar ltos //
analyzed: dngos po ltos grub gang yin pa // de ma grub na ji ltar ltos //
translated: That which is established in dependence on an entity

original: ci ste grub pa ltos shen //
analyzed: ci ste grub pa ltos shen //
translated: How could that be established if it is not established?🔽But if it is established, then it is not dependent.

original: de ni ltos par mi rigs so //
analyzed: de ni ltos par mi rigs so //
translated: It is not tenable that it is dependent.

original: me zhes bya ba'i dngos po bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po la ltos nas grub pa gang yin pa de ma grub pa'am grub pa zhig bud shing la ltos grang /🔽gal te ma grub pa zhig yin na ni /
analyzed: me zhes bya ba'i dngos po bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po la ltos nas grub pa gang yin pa de ma grub pa'am grub pa zhig bud shing la ltos grang / gal te ma grub pa zhig yin na ni /
translated: That which is called “fire” is established in dependence on that which is called “fuel.” If it is not established, how could it depend on fuel?

original: de'i tshe ma grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe ma grub pa'i phyir /
translated: But if it is established, then it is not dependent.

original: bud shing la mi ltos te bong bu'i rva bzhin no //
analyzed: bud shing la mi ltos te bong bu'i rva bzhin no //
translated: If it is not established, then it is not dependent on fuel, like the horn of an ass.

original: ci ste grub pa yin na ni grub pa'i phyir de ltos ci dgos te /
analyzed: ci ste grub pa yin na ni grub pa'i phyir de ltos ci dgos te /
translated: But if it were established, then since it is established, what need is there for it to depend?

original: don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir grub zin pa yin yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir grub zin pa yin yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Because it would be pointless, even though it is already established, it is not to be established.

original: de bzhin du bud shing la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bud shing la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: So too, fuel should be stated in the same way.

original: de'i phyir me dang bud shing dag phan tshun ltos par ram /
analyzed: de'i phyir me dang bud shing dag phan tshun ltos par ram /
translated: Therefore, fire and fuel do not exist in mutual dependence,

original: dus gcig tu grub pa med do //
analyzed: dus gcig tu grub pa med do //
translated: nor do they exist at the same time.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because that is so,

original: shing la ma ltos pa'i me med de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shing la ma ltos pa'i me med de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, “Without depending on fuel, fire does not exist.”

original: ci ste 'o na ma ltos par mer 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: ci ste 'o na ma ltos par mer 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: But if you think, “If it does not depend on it, it becomes fire,”

original: 'di yang mi rung ngo zhes @72a * //
analyzed: 'di yang mi rung ngo zhes @72a * //
translated: it is also not tenable.

original: gsungs pa ni /🔽shing la ma ltos me yang med //
analyzed: gsungs pa ni / shing la ma ltos me yang med //
translated: To explain this, it is said:

original: ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ste /
translated: Without depending on fuel, fire does not exist.

original: gzhan nyid bkag zin pa'i phyir dang / rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan nyid bkag zin pa'i phyir dang / rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because difference has already been refuted and because it follows that it would be causeless.

original: ji ltar bud shing la ltos pa'am /
analyzed: ji ltar bud shing la ltos pa'am /
translated: How could fire exist without depending on fuel?

original: ma ltos pa'i me med pa de bzhin du bud shing yang yin no zhes gsungs pa ni /🔽me la ltos pa'i shing med de //🔽me la ma ltos shing yang med //
analyzed: ma ltos pa'i me med pa de bzhin du bud shing yang yin no zhes gsungs pa ni / me la ltos pa'i shing med de // me la ma ltos shing yang med //
translated: So too, fuel does not exist without fire.🔽Fire does not depend on fuel,

original: ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ste /
translated: and fuel does not depend on fire.

original: 'di'i don ni thal ma thag tu go bar zad pa nyid kyis na yang mi brjod do //
analyzed: 'di'i don ni thal ma thag tu go bar zad pa nyid kyis na yang mi brjod do //
translated: The meaning of this is completely understood immediately after it is stated, and so it will not be elaborated here.

original: 'dir smras pa dpyad pa shin tu phra mo 'dis kho bo cag la ci dgos te /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa dpyad pa shin tu phra mo 'dis kho bo cag la ci dgos te /
translated: Here, someone might say, “What need do we have for this very subtle analysis?

original: gang gi phyir kho bo cag ni mngon sum gyi bud shing mes bsreg bzhin pa dmigs pa de'i phyir me dang bud shing dag yod do zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig smra'o zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kho bo cag ni mngon sum gyi bud shing mes bsreg bzhin pa dmigs pa de'i phyir me dang bud shing dag yod do zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig smra'o zhe na /
translated: We simply say that fire and fuel exist because we observe fuel being burned by fire.”

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: gal te mes bud shing bsregs na de de ltar 'gyur na //
analyzed: gal te mes bud shing bsregs na de de ltar 'gyur na //
translated: If fire burned fuel, that would be so.

original: sreg pa ni ma yin te 'di ltar gal te /
analyzed: sreg pa ni ma yin te 'di ltar gal te /
translated: But it does not burn, because if

original: shing la me yod na ni des bud shing sreg par 'gyur na /
analyzed: shing la me yod na ni des bud shing sreg par 'gyur na /
translated: fire existed, it would burn fuel.

original: yod pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: yod pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
translated: But it does not exist.

original: me ni gzhan las mi 'ong ste //
analyzed: me ni gzhan las mi 'ong ste //
translated: Fire does not come from another.

original: shing la'ang me ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: shing la'ang me ni yod ma yin //
translated: Fire does not exist in fuel.

original: re zhig me ni bud shing ma gtogs par gzhan 'ga' zhig las 'ong ba med de /
analyzed: re zhig me ni bud shing ma gtogs par gzhan 'ga' zhig las 'ong ba med de /
translated: Fire does not come from anywhere to the fuel, because it is not seen.

original: de ma mthong ba'i phyir dang // rgyu med pas bud shing dang bral ba'i me la 'ong ba med pa'i phyir dang / bud shing dang bcas pa 'ong ba la dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang / der yang bud shing dang brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pas thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ma mthong ba'i phyir dang // rgyu med pas bud shing dang bral ba'i me la 'ong ba med pa'i phyir dang / bud shing dang bcas pa 'ong ba la dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang / der yang bud shing dang brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pas thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: Since it is causeless, fire devoid of fuel does not come. Since it is purposeless for fire to come with fuel, and since the analysis and investigation of fuel there is similar, the consequence is that there is an infinite regress.

original: me ni gzhan las mi 'ong ste //
analyzed: me ni gzhan las mi 'ong ste //
translated: Fire does not come from another.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: shing la yang me yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: shing la yang me yod pa ma yin te /
translated: fire does not exist in fuel,

original: de la ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: de la ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because it is not observed there.

original: / ci ste rtsa ba dang chu la sogs pa ltar yod du zin kyang mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i rkyen ma tshang bas sngar dmigs par ma gyur bzhin du phyis gtsub shing gtsubs pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: / ci ste rtsa ba dang chu la sogs pa ltar yod du zin kyang mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i rkyen ma tshang bas sngar dmigs par ma gyur bzhin du phyis gtsub shing gtsubs pa la sogs pa /
translated: But if it does exist there like roots and water, etc., since the conditions that manifest it are incomplete, it is not observed previously, but later it is observed through the rubbing together of kindling sticks, etc.

original: mngon par gsal bar byad pa'i rkyen yod pa las dmigs pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: mngon par gsal bar byad pa'i rkyen yod pa las dmigs pa yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that the seed is the object of the visual consciousness because it is the condition for the manifestation of the visual consciousness,

original: ci ste rtsa ba dang chu la sogs pa rnams la mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i rkyen dag gis ci zhig byed ces 'di nyid re zhig dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: ci ste rtsa ba dang chu la sogs pa rnams la mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i rkyen dag gis ci zhig byed ces 'di nyid re zhig dpyad par bya'o //
translated: then we must examine what the conditions for manifestation do to the seed, the water, etc.

original: de la re zhig rang gi ngo bo ni mi byed de yod par gyur pa'i phyir ro //🔽mngon par gsal bar byed do zhe na /
analyzed: de la re zhig rang gi ngo bo ni mi byed de yod par gyur pa'i phyir ro // mngon par gsal bar byed do zhe na /
translated: First, they do not cause the seed to exist, because it already exists.🔽If you say that they cause the manifestation of the seed,

original: mngon par gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig gsal ba'o //
analyzed: mngon par gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig gsal ba'o //
translated: what is this so-called manifestation?

original: de la @72b na ni /
analyzed: de la @72b na ni /
translated: If it is the seed itself,🔽then the conditions for manifestation would be useless, because the seed would exist even without them.

original: 'o na de sngar yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir de nyid byed par 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'o na de sngar yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir de nyid byed par 'gyur la /
translated: If it is something other than the seed, then the seed would not exist, because the manifestation would be something other than the seed.

original: de lta na rgyu la 'bras bu yod par smra ba btang bar 'gyur te /🔽sngar mngon par gsal ba med pa'i phyir dang / phyis yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na rgyu la 'bras bu yod par smra ba btang bar 'gyur te /🔽sngar mngon par gsal ba med pa'i phyir dang / phyis yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you say that the conditions for manifestation cause the manifestation of the seed,🔽then the conditions for manifestation would be useless, because the seed would exist even without them.🔽If you say that the conditions for manifestation cause the manifestation of something other than the seed, then the seed would not exist, because the manifestation would be something other than the seed.

original: rang gi ngo bo skye ba'i rkyen la ltos pa med pa'i phyir mngon par gsal ba rkyen la ltos pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo skye ba'i rkyen la ltos pa med pa'i phyir mngon par gsal ba rkyen la ltos pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: Because it does not depend on conditions for its own arising, it is not even tenable that manifestation depends on conditions.

original: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
translated: It is like a sky flower.

original: gzhan yang mngon par gsal ba 'di ni dngos po mngon par gsal bar gyur pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang mngon par gsal ba 'di ni dngos po mngon par gsal bar gyur pa'am /
translated: Moreover, if this manifestation is imagined to be either a thing that has become manifest or

original: mngon par gsal bar ma gyur pa 'ga' zhig la rtog pa zhig na /
analyzed: mngon par gsal bar ma gyur pa 'ga' zhig la rtog pa zhig na /
translated: a thing that has not become manifest,

original: de la re zhig mngon par gsal bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par gsal bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de la re zhig mngon par gsal bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par gsal bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: then first, that which has become manifest is not something that is being manifested.

original: de la mngon par gsal bar bya ba don med pa'i phyir dang / thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la mngon par gsal bar bya ba don med pa'i phyir dang / thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is meaningless to manifest it, and because it would follow, absurdly, that there would be an infinite regress.

original: mngon par gsal bar ma gyur pa yang mngon par gsal bar mi byed de /
analyzed: mngon par gsal bar ma gyur pa yang mngon par gsal bar mi byed de /
translated: That which has not become manifest also does not manifest.

original: mngon par gsal bar ma gyur pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mngon par gsal bar ma gyur pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it has not become manifest.

original: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
translated: It is like a sky flower.

original: de ltar na mngon par gsal ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par gsal ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus manifestation does not exist.

original: ci ste yang rkyen rnams kyis yod par gyur pa rags pa nyid du byed pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: ci ste yang rkyen rnams kyis yod par gyur pa rags pa nyid du byed pa yin no snyam na /
translated: But if you think that conditions make that which exists become gross,

original: de lta na yang rags pa nyid sngar med pas de nyid byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na yang rags pa nyid sngar med pas de nyid byed par 'gyur te /
translated: then even in that case, since grossness did not exist previously, it would be created.

original: de'i phyir rags pa nyid du byas pas mngon par gsal bar ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i phyir rags pa nyid du byas pas mngon par gsal bar ga la 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could it be manifest due to being made gross?

original: phra ba nyid kyang rgyu med pas med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phra ba nyid kyang rgyu med pas med pa'i phyir /
translated: Since grossness does not exist due to a cause,

original: ci zhig rags par byas pa las mngon par gsal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ci zhig rags par byas pa las mngon par gsal bar 'gyur /
translated: what would become manifest due to making it gross?

original: de'i phyir de ltar rnam pa thams cad du bud shing la me mi srid pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar rnam pa thams cad du bud shing la me mi srid pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, since fire is impossible in any way in relation to fuel,

original: shing la'ang me ni yod ma yin //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shing la'ang me ni yod ma yin // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Fire does not exist in fuel.

original: yod pa ma yin pa'i mes ni bud shing sreg pa yang mi 'thad pas /
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa'i mes ni bud shing sreg pa yang mi 'thad pas /
translated: Since it is untenable that nonexistent fire burns fuel,

original: 'di ni khyod kyis mi bden pa zhig mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni khyod kyis mi bden pa zhig mthong ba yin no //
translated: this is something you see that is not true.

original: gzhan yang song ba dang ma song ba dang / bgom pa dag la sun 'byin pa sngar bshad pa ji lta ba /
analyzed: gzhan yang song ba dang ma song ba dang / bgom pa dag la sun 'byin pa sngar bshad pa ji lta ba /
translated: Moreover, just as the refutation of going in relation to that being gone over, not yet gone over, and that being gone over was explained earlier,

original: de bzhin shing gi lhag ma ni //
analyzed: de bzhin shing gi lhag ma ni //
translated: So too the remainder of the log

original: song dang ma song bgom pas bstan //
analyzed: song dang ma song bgom pas bstan //
translated: Going, not yet gone, and that being gone over illustrate this.

original: bud shing mes sreg bzhin pa dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bud shing 'di'i ste ;
analyzed: bud shing mes sreg bzhin pa dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bud shing 'di'i ste ;
translated: The fire that burns the fuel is observed.

original: bud shing gi skabs kyi sun 'byin lhag ma ni /
analyzed: bud shing gi skabs kyi sun 'byin lhag ma ni /
translated: The remaining refutations of fuel🔽are similar to those of going.

original: re zhig bsregs pa mi sreg ste //
analyzed: re zhig bsregs pa mi sreg ste //
translated: First, the burned is not being burned,

original: ma bsregs pa la'ang sreg pa min //
analyzed: ma bsregs pa la'ang sreg pa min //
translated: nor is the unburned being burned.

original: bsregs dang ma bsregs ma gtogs pa'i //
analyzed: bsregs dang ma bsregs ma gtogs pa'i //
translated: Apart from the burned and the unburned,

original: bsreg bzhin shes par mi 'gyur ro //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan zin pa'i phyir 'don pa bzlog pa'i sgo nas song ba dang @73a * //
analyzed: bsreg bzhin shes par mi 'gyur ro // zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan zin pa'i phyir 'don pa bzlog pa'i sgo nas song ba dang @73a * //
translated: the being burned is not known.

original: ma song ba dang bgom pa'i sun 'byin pa dang mtshungs par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ma song ba dang bgom pa'i sun 'byin pa dang mtshungs par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since this has already been explained, the refutation of going, not yet gone, and that being gone over should be understood in the reverse order.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir bud shing mes bsreg pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir bud shing mes bsreg pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Since that is so, it should be understood that fuel is not burned by fire.

original: da ni ji skad bstan pa'i don gyi mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /🔽shing nyid mo ni ma yin te //
analyzed: da ni ji skad bstan pa'i don gyi mjug bsdu ba'i phyir / shing nyid mo ni ma yin te //
translated: Now, in order to draw a conclusion about the point that has been taught, it is said:🔽Wood is not fire,

original: shing las gzhan la me yang med //
analyzed: shing las gzhan la me yang med //
translated: and fire is not other than wood.

original: me ni shing dang ldan ma yin //
analyzed: me ni shing dang ldan ma yin //
translated: Fire is not endowed with fuel.

original: me la shing med der de med //
analyzed: me la shing med der de med //
translated: Fire does not have fuel, nor is it without fuel.

original: ces bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.🔽In response to that,

original: de la / bud shing gang de me yin na //
analyzed: de la / bud shing gang de me yin na //
translated: If fuel were fire,

original: byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur //
translated: agent and action would be one.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis me dang bud shing dag gcig nyid yin pa bkag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis me dang bud shing dag gcig nyid yin pa bkag pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, since it is refuted that fire and fuel are one,

original: shing nyid me ni ma yin te //
analyzed: shing nyid me ni ma yin te //
translated: Fuel is not fire.

original: zhes bya'o // gal te shing las me gzhan na //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // gal te shing las me gzhan na //
translated: If fire were different from fuel,

original: shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: It would arise even without fuel.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan yin pa bkag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan yin pa bkag pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, since it is refuted that they are different,

original: shing las gzhan la me yang med do //
analyzed: shing las gzhan la me yang med do //
translated: Fire is not different from fuel.🔽Since the two positions of sameness and difference are refuted,

original: de nyid dang gzhan nyid kyi phyogs gnyi ga bkag pa nyid kyis na de dang ldan pa dang rten dang brten pa'i phyogs dag kyang /
analyzed: de nyid dang gzhan nyid kyi phyogs gnyi ga bkag pa nyid kyis na de dang ldan pa dang rten dang brten pa'i phyogs dag kyang /
translated: the positions of endowment and the supported and the supporter are also🔽implicitly refuted.

original: don gyis bkag pa'i phyir de dag kyang mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: don gyis bkag pa'i phyir de dag kyang mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to summarize those,

original: me ni shing dang ldan ma yin //
analyzed: me ni shing dang ldan ma yin //
translated: Fire is not endowed with fuel.

original: me la shing med der de med //
analyzed: me la shing med der de med //
translated: Fire does not have fuel, nor is it without fuel.

original: ces bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de la me ni shing dang ldan pa ma yin no //🔽'di'i lam 'di la bud shing yod do zhes tha dad pa'am /
analyzed: de la me ni shing dang ldan pa ma yin no // 'di'i lam 'di la bud shing yod do zhes tha dad pa'am /
translated: Fire is not associated with fuel.🔽If you explain that fire is associated with fuel, is it associated with fuel as different from it or as non-different from it?

original: tha mi dad par bye brag tu 'chad grang na de la tha dad par ni /
analyzed: tha mi dad par bye brag tu 'chad grang na de la tha dad par ni /
translated: If it is associated with fuel as different from it,

original: dper na lha sbyin ba glang dang ldan no zhes bya ba lta bu yin la /🔽tha mi dad par ni lha sbyin blo dang ldan no //
analyzed: dper na lha sbyin ba glang dang ldan no zhes bya ba lta bu yin la / tha mi dad par ni lha sbyin blo dang ldan no //
translated: then it is like Devadatta’s association with a cow.🔽If it is associated with fuel as non-different from it,

original: lha sbyin gzugs dang ldan no zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu yin na /
analyzed: lha sbyin gzugs dang ldan no zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu yin na /
translated: then it is like Devadatta’s association with his own intelligence, or with his own body.

original: me dang bud shing dag la phyogs gnyi ga yang bkag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: me dang bud shing dag la phyogs gnyi ga yang bkag pa'i phyir /
translated: But since both of these positions have been refuted in the case of fire and fuel,

original: me shing dang ldan no zhes bya ba'ang bkag pa byas pa yin no //
analyzed: me shing dang ldan no zhes bya ba'ang bkag pa byas pa yin no //
translated: the statement “Fire is associated with fuel” has also been refuted.

original: gzhan du gyur ba'i 'khar gzhong ni rgya shug rnams kyi rten nyid du rtog na /🔽me la ni bud shing las gzhan pa nyid kyang yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: gzhan du gyur ba'i 'khar gzhong ni rgya shug rnams kyi rten nyid du rtog na / me la ni bud shing las gzhan pa nyid kyang yod pa ma yin pas /
translated: If you imagine that a different pot is the basis of the jujube fruit,🔽then since fire is not different from fuel,

original: me la shing med ces bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: me la shing med ces bya bar rigs so //
translated: it is reasonable to say that fire does not exist in fuel.

original: bud shing la yang me med de gzhan nyid bkag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bud shing la yang me med de gzhan nyid bkag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Fuel also does not have fire because difference is refuted.

original: de ltar na rten dang brten pa nyid bkag pa yang don gyis bstan pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rten dang brten pa nyid bkag pa yang don gyis bstan pa nyid yin no //
translated: Thus the refutation of the basis and the dependent is also implicitly taught.

original: ji ltar rnam pa lngar rnam par brtags pa na /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa lngar rnam par brtags pa na /
translated: Just as fire is not found in the five ways when analyzed,🔽so also the self is.

original: me yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du bdag kyang yin no zhes bsgre ba'i phyir /🔽me dang shing gis bdag dang ni //
analyzed: me yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du bdag kyang yin no zhes bsgre ba'i phyir / me dang shing gis bdag dang ni //
translated: In order to demonstrate this, [Nāgārjuna] states:

original: nye bar len pa'i rim pa kun //
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i rim pa kun //
translated: The self and all the processes of appropriation🔽Are explained in their entirety

original: bum @73b snam sogs dang lhan cig tu //🔽ma lus par ni rnam par bshad //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: bum @73b snam sogs dang lhan cig tu // ma lus par ni rnam par bshad // ces gsungs so //
translated: Together with the pot, cloth, and so on.

original: de la nye bar blang bar bya bas na /
analyzed: de la nye bar blang bar bya bas na /
translated: Here, since it is that which is appropriated,

original: nye bar len pa ste nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa ste nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //
translated: it is the appropriated, which is the five appropriated aggregates.

original: de dag la nye bar brten nas brtags pa /🔽nye bar len pa po /
analyzed: de dag la nye bar brten nas brtags pa / nye bar len pa po /
translated: The self is imputed in dependence on them.🔽The appropriator

original: 'dzin pa po /
analyzed: 'dzin pa po /
translated: is the one who grasps.

original: sgrub par byed pa po gang yin pa de ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir 'di la bdag tu nga rgyal bzhag cing bskyed pas na bdag ces bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa po gang yin pa de ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir 'di la bdag tu nga rgyal bzhag cing bskyed pas na bdag ces bya'o //
translated: That which is the agent of the performance is called the self because the self is posited and generated as the object of the conception of self.

original: de'i phyir / bdag de dang nye bar len pa'i grub pa'i rim pa de thams cad ma lus par me dang bud shing dag gis rnam par bshad par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir / bdag de dang nye bar len pa'i grub pa'i rim pa de thams cad ma lus par me dang bud shing dag gis rnam par bshad par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, understand that the entire process of the establishment of the self and the appropriation is explained by the example of fire and fuel.

original: yang kun dang ma lus pa la khyad par ci lta yod ce na /
analyzed: yang kun dang ma lus pa la khyad par ci lta yod ce na /
translated: What is the difference between all and without remainder?

original: kun smos pa ni thal ma thag pa'i phyogs lnga po sbyor bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: kun smos pa ni thal ma thag pa'i phyogs lnga po sbyor bar byed pa yin te /
translated: The expression all is applied to the five positions immediately above.

original: phyogs lnga po de dag thams cad kyang ma tshang ba med par me dang bud shing ltar bdag dang nye bar len pa gnyis la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs lnga po de dag thams cad kyang ma tshang ba med par me dang bud shing ltar bdag dang nye bar len pa gnyis la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: All five positions are applied without exception to the self and the appropriation, like fire and fuel.

original: 'di dag ston pa la 'thad pa'i tshul sngar brjod pa gang yin pa de yang ma lus pas bdag dang nye bar len pa dag dgag par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ston pa la 'thad pa'i tshul sngar brjod pa gang yin pa de yang ma lus pas bdag dang nye bar len pa dag dgag par rig par bya'o //
translated: The way that this is taught is the same as what was previously stated, and it should be understood that this is the refutation of both the self and the appropriated aggregates in their entirety.

original: bdag dang nye bar len pa dag dgag pa me dang bud shing dag dang bdag nyid thams cad kyis mtshungs pa ni 'di gnyis kyi sgo nas yin par rig par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽rim pa kun /
analyzed: bdag dang nye bar len pa dag dgag pa me dang bud shing dag dang bdag nyid thams cad kyis mtshungs pa ni 'di gnyis kyi sgo nas yin par rig par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir / rim pa kun /
translated: The refutation of the self and the appropriated aggregates is the same in all respects as the refutation of fire and fuel. This should be understood in terms of the following two points.🔽The verse says,

original: ma lus par ni zhes bshad do //
analyzed: ma lus par ni zhes bshad do //
translated: “In every way, without exception.”

original: de la nye bar len pa gang yin pa de nyid bdag nyid yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de la nye bar len pa gang yin pa de nyid bdag nyid yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not tenable to say that the appropriated aggregates are the self.

original: byed pa po dang las dag gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las dag gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it would then follow, absurdly, that the agent and the object of the action would be one and the same thing.

original: nye bar len pa gzhan la nye bar len pa po gzhan ma yang ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa gzhan la nye bar len pa po gzhan ma yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor can it be said that the self is different from the appropriated aggregates.

original: bdag phung po las tha dad par yang dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag phung po las tha dad par yang dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that the self would be perceived as separate from the aggregates, and because it would follow, absurdly, that it would be independent of other things.

original: gcig nyid dang gzhan nyid bkag pa'i phyir bdag phung po dang ldan pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig nyid dang gzhan nyid bkag pa'i phyir bdag phung po dang ldan pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Because of the refutation of sameness and difference, the self does not possess the aggregates.

original: gzhan nyid med pa'i phyir bdag la phung po dag yod pa dang / phung po dag la bdag yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan nyid med pa'i phyir bdag la phung po dag yod pa dang / phung po dag la bdag yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Because of the refutation of difference, the self does not have the aggregates and the aggregates do not have the self.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar rnam pa lngar bdag yod pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar rnam pa lngar bdag yod pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Since the self does not exist in any of these five ways,

original: las dang byed pa po ltar bdag dang nye bar len pa gnyis phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //🔽bdag dang nye bar len pa dag @74a * //
analyzed: las dang byed pa po ltar bdag dang nye bar len pa gnyis phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa yin no zhes bya bar gnas so // bdag dang nye bar len pa dag @74a * //
translated: it is established that the self and the appropriated are mutually dependent, just like action and agent.

original: gi rim pa gang yin pa de yang de gnyis kho na'i ma yin te /
analyzed: gi rim pa gang yin pa de yang de gnyis kho na'i ma yin te /
translated: The order in which the self and the appropriated exist is not the only one that is not tenable.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, “Well then, what is?”🔽The order in which the self and the appropriated exist is not tenable

original: bum snam sogs dang lhan cig tu //
analyzed: bum snam sogs dang lhan cig tu //
translated: even in terms of such things as a pot and cloth.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: dngos po ma lus pa dag dang lhan cig tu rnam pa thams cad rnam par bshad par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po ma lus pa dag dang lhan cig tu rnam pa thams cad rnam par bshad par rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that all things are explained in this way.

original: bum pa la sogs pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur ba'am /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur ba'am /
translated: Such things as a pot are causes and effects,

original: yan lag dang yan lag can du gyur pa'am /
analyzed: yan lag dang yan lag can du gyur pa'am /
translated: parts and a whole,

original: mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhir gyur pa'am /
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhir gyur pa'am /
translated: characteristics and a basis of characteristics,

original: yon tan dang yon tan can du gyur pa dag yin te /
analyzed: yon tan dang yon tan can du gyur pa dag yin te /
translated: and qualities and a basis of qualities.

original: de la 'jim pa dang dbyu gu dang 'khor lo dang skud pa dang chu dang rdza mkhan gyi lag pa'i rtsol ba la sogs pa rnams ni bum pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: de la 'jim pa dang dbyu gu dang 'khor lo dang skud pa dang chu dang rdza mkhan gyi lag pa'i rtsol ba la sogs pa rnams ni bum pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin la /
translated: In that regard, such things as clay, a stick, a wheel, string, water, and the potter’s hand and so on are causes of a pot,

original: bum pa ni 'bras bur gyur pa'o //🔽dum bu la sogs pa'am /
analyzed: bum pa ni 'bras bur gyur pa'o // dum bu la sogs pa'am /
translated: and the pot is the effect.

original: sngon po la sogs pa dag ni yan lag tu gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa dag ni yan lag tu gyur pa yin la /
translated: Such things as pieces and blue and so on are parts,

original: bum pa ni yan lag can yin no //
analyzed: bum pa ni yan lag can yin no //
translated: and the pot is the whole.

original: lto ba yangs pa dang / mchu 'phyang ba dang / kha g-yel ba dang / mgul ba ring ba nyid la sogs pa rnams ni mtshan nyid yin la /
analyzed: lto ba yangs pa dang / mchu 'phyang ba dang / kha g-yel ba dang / mgul ba ring ba nyid la sogs pa rnams ni mtshan nyid yin la /
translated: A pot’s being bulbous, having a flat base, having a rounded belly, having a constricted neck, having a flaring lip, having a long neck, and so on are its characteristics.

original: bum pa ni mtshan gzhi'o //
analyzed: bum pa ni mtshan gzhi'o //
translated: The pot is the characterized.

original: sngo bsangs nyid la sogs pa dag ni yon tan yin la /
analyzed: sngo bsangs nyid la sogs pa dag ni yon tan yin la /
translated: Blueness and so on are its qualities.🔽The pot is the possessor of qualities.

original: bum pa ni yon tan can yin no zhes de ltar rnam par gzhag pa la yang me dang bud shing ltar rim par rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bum pa ni yon tan can yin no zhes de ltar rnam par gzhag pa la yang me dang bud shing ltar rim par rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In this way, the pot and so on are posited. This should be applied in the same way as the case of fire and fuel.

original: bum pa la sogs pa rnams dang bdag dang nye bar len pa dag rnam par bshad pa ni dbu ma la 'jug pa las nges par bya'o //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa rnams dang bdag dang nye bar len pa dag rnam par bshad pa ni dbu ma la 'jug pa las nges par bya'o //
translated: The explanation of the pot and so on and the self and the appropriated aggregates should be understood from the Madhyamakavatara.🔽Therefore, in this way, like action and the agent, the self and the appropriated aggregates and the pot and so on are posited as mutually dependent.

original: de'i phyir de ltar las dang byed pa po ltar bdag dang nye bar len pa dang bum pa la sogs pa rnams phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa yin par rnam par gzhag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab kyi don phyin ci ma log pa yin par mngon🔽par rlom pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar las dang byed pa po ltar bdag dang nye bar len pa dang bum pa la sogs pa rnams phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa yin par rnam par gzhag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab kyi don phyin ci ma log pa yin par mngon🔽par rlom pa nyid kyis /
translated: With the mere thought that this is the unmistaken meaning of the scriptures of the Tathagata,

original: mu stegs pa'i gzhung lugs kyis nye bar brtags pa'i don gyi rnam par gzhag pa /
analyzed: mu stegs pa'i gzhung lugs kyis nye bar brtags pa'i don gyi rnam par gzhag pa /
translated: The meaning of the term is as follows: the meaning of the term “non-Buddhist” is that they are outside the fold of Buddhists.🔽

original: bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab las khong du chud pa'i don nyid du gcus nas /🔽shin tu blun pa nyid kyis na //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab las khong du chud pa'i don nyid du gcus nas / shin tu blun pa nyid kyis na //
translated: The meaning of the treatises of the tīrthikas is twisted into the very meaning that is understood from the scriptures of the Tathāgata.

original: gang dag bdag dang dngos po rnams //
analyzed: gang dag bdag dang dngos po rnams //
translated: The master does not think that those who teach that the self and things

original: de bcas nyid dang tha dad par //
analyzed: de bcas nyid dang tha dad par //
translated: are the same or different are wise

original: ston pa de dag bstan don la //🔽mkhas so snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: ston pa de dag bstan don la // mkhas so snyam du mi sems so //
translated: with regard to the meaning of the teaching.

original: de la de dang lhan cig tu 'jug pas na de bcas so //🔽de dang bcas pa'i dngos po nyid ni de bcas nyid de /
analyzed: de la de dang lhan cig tu 'jug pas na de bcas so // de dang bcas pa'i dngos po nyid ni de bcas nyid de /
translated: The meaning of “the same” is that they are engaged together.

original: tha mi dad pa rang gzhan ma yin pa dang gcig nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa rang gzhan ma yin pa dang gcig nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “the same thing” is that they are not different, not other, and are the same.

original: @74b gang dag de bcas nyid der smra ba de dag ni bstan pa'i don la mkhas par slob dpon mi dgongs so //
analyzed: @74b gang dag de bcas nyid der smra ba de dag ni bstan pa'i don la mkhas par slob dpon mi dgongs so //
translated: The master does not think that those who teach that the self and things are the same are wise with regard to the meaning of the teaching.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example, the appropriated aggregates are the same as the self in the sense that they are the basis of the imputation of the self.

original: nye bar len pa gang gis bdag tu 'dogs pa'i nye bar len pa de dang de lhan cig pa nyid du yod de /
analyzed: nye bar len pa gang gis bdag tu 'dogs pa'i nye bar len pa de dang de lhan cig pa nyid du yod de /
translated: The appropriated aggregates are the same as the self in the sense that they are the basis of the imputation of the self.

original: so so ma yin zhing tha mi dad par yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig yin pa dang / de bzhin du 'jim pa la sogs pa'i rgyu gang gis bum par 'dogs pa de dang der tha mi dad pa nyid du yod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: so so ma yin zhing tha mi dad par yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig yin pa dang / de bzhin du 'jim pa la sogs pa'i rgyu gang gis bum par 'dogs pa de dang der tha mi dad pa nyid du yod pa yin gyi /
translated: They exist as undifferentiated from that, but not as separate.

original: so sor ni ma yin pa de ltar gang dag bdag dang dngos po rnams de dang bcas pa nyid du smra ba de dag ni /
analyzed: so sor ni ma yin pa de ltar gang dag bdag dang dngos po rnams de dang bcas pa nyid du smra ba de dag ni /
translated: In this way, those who say that the self and things exist in that way

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mchog tu zab pa /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mchog tu zab pa /
translated: do not see dependent origination, which is the profound

original: rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral ba /
analyzed: rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral ba /
translated: and free from eternalism and nihilism,

original: brten nas gdags pa'i ming can gyi de kho na nyid mthong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: brten nas gdags pa'i ming can gyi de kho na nyid mthong ba ma yin no //
translated: the reality that is designated in dependence.

original: gang dag bdag kyang gzhan la nye bar len pa yang gzhan /
analyzed: gang dag bdag kyang gzhan la nye bar len pa yang gzhan /
translated: Those who say that the self is one thing and the appropriated aggregates are another

original: 'bras bu yang gzhan rgyu yang gzhan no zhes bya ba la sogs pas so so so sor ston par byed cing gzhan nyid du mthong ba de dag bstan pa'i don la mkhas par slob dpon ni mi dgongs so //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang gzhan rgyu yang gzhan no zhes bya ba la sogs pas so so so sor ston par byed cing gzhan nyid du mthong ba de dag bstan pa'i don la mkhas par slob dpon ni mi dgongs so //
translated: The Master does not think that those who teach and see difference in this way are skilled in the meaning of the teaching.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'gro ba sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar //
analyzed: 'gro ba sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar //
translated: The world is like an echo,

original: gcig nyid gzhan nyid dang bral zhing //
analyzed: gcig nyid gzhan nyid dang bral zhing //
translated: free from sameness and difference,

original: 'pho dang 'jig pa dang bral bar //🔽smad med khyod kyis thugs su chud //
analyzed: 'pho dang 'jig pa dang bral bar // smad med khyod kyis thugs su chud //
translated: free from transition and destruction,

original: ces bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ces bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: you have understood it without deprecation.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor pa me dang bud shing brtag pas chos kyi de kho na nyid khong du chud pa'i lus ni dus mtha'i me dag gam //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pa me dang bud shing brtag pas chos kyi de kho na nyid khong du chud pa'i lus ni dus mtha'i me dag gam //
translated: Thus, the yogi/nī who has understood the reality of phenomena through the analysis of fire and fuel does not burn with the fires at the end of the eon or

original: nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi me dag gis 'tshig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi me dag gis 'tshig pa ma yin no //
translated: the fires of the afflictions of desire, hatred, and ignorance.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: bskal pa brgya phrag mang por rab bsregs kyang //
analyzed: bskal pa brgya phrag mang por rab bsregs kyang //
translated: Though you burn for many hundreds of eons,

original: nam mkha' sngon chad nam yang mi 'tshig bzhin //
analyzed: nam mkha' sngon chad nam yang mi 'tshig bzhin //
translated: The sky has never burned before.

original: chos rnams nam mkha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas //
analyzed: chos rnams nam mkha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas //
translated: Knowing that phenomena are like the sky,🔽he will not burn in the fire.

original: de ni gzhan yang me nang yong mi 'tshig / gal te sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'bar gyur la //
analyzed: de ni gzhan yang me nang yong mi 'tshig / gal te sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'bar gyur la //
translated: If the buddha-fields were to burn,

original: 'bar ba 'di dag ma lus zhi shog ces //🔽ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btab pa //
analyzed: 'bar ba 'di dag ma lus zhi shog ces // ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btab pa //
translated: may this put out all the flames.🔽Even if the earth were to be destroyed,

original: sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med //🔽ces gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med // ces gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: there would be no change in him who has made this aspiration while in samādhi.

original: de bzhin du /🔽ji ltar gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan dang // lag pa'i rtsol ba 'di gsum 'dus pa yi //
analyzed: de bzhin du / ji ltar gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan dang // lag pa'i rtsol ba 'di gsum 'dus pa yi //
translated: And:🔽Just as fire arises from the contact of the stick and the feathers

original: rkyen 'di dag las me ni 'byung 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: rkyen 'di dag las me ni 'byung 'gyur zhing //
translated: and the effort of the hand,

original: byung ste bya ba byas nas myur du 'gag //
analyzed: byung ste bya ba byas nas myur du 'gag //
translated: and having arisen, performs its function and quickly ceases,

original: de nas 'di ni gang @75a * //
analyzed: de nas 'di ni gang @75a * //
translated: where does it come from?

original: nas 'ongs sam gar //
analyzed: nas 'ongs sam gar //
translated: Where does it go?

original: song zhes mkhas pa gang zhig tshol bar byed //
analyzed: song zhes mkhas pa gang zhig tshol bar byed //
translated: What wise man would search for this?

original: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu btsal ba dang // 'di yi 'gro dang 'ong ba rnyed min bzhin //
analyzed: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu btsal ba dang // 'di yi 'gro dang 'ong ba rnyed min bzhin //
translated: Just as when searching in all directions and intermediate directions, The coming and going of this [mind] are not found.

original: phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams ni //
analyzed: phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams ni //
translated: The aggregates, sense bases, and elements,

original: nang yang stong la phyi rol stong pa ste //
analyzed: nang yang stong la phyi rol stong pa ste //
translated: Are empty internally and externally,

original: thams cad bdag gis dben zhing gnas med la //
analyzed: thams cad bdag gis dben zhing gnas med la //
translated: All are devoid of self and without abode,

original: chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: The characteristic of phenomena is the essence of space.

original: chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag ni //
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag ni //
translated: These characteristics of phenomena,

original: mar me mdzad pa mthong nas khyod kyis rtogs //
analyzed: mar me mdzad pa mthong nas khyod kyis rtogs //
translated: You realized upon seeing Dīpaṃkara,

original: ji ltar nyid kyis rjes su rtogs pa ltar //
analyzed: ji ltar nyid kyis rjes su rtogs pa ltar //
translated: Just as you realized it,

original: de bzhin lha mir bcas pas rtogs par gyis //🔽log pa yang dag ma yin brtags pa yi //
analyzed: de bzhin lha mir bcas pas rtogs par gyis // log pa yang dag ma yin brtags pa yi //
translated: May gods and humans also realize it.

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis 'gro ba gdungs //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis 'gro ba gdungs //
translated: Beings are tormented by desire and hatred,🔽Which are false, unreal, and imagined.

original: thugs rje'i sprin las zhi ba bsil ba'i chu //
analyzed: thugs rje'i sprin las zhi ba bsil ba'i chu //
translated: From the cloud of compassion, with the cool water of peace,

original: 'dren pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab tu phob //
analyzed: 'dren pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab tu phob //
translated: O Guide, may the stream of nectar rain down.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: And so forth.

original: slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
analyzed: slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
translated: This is from the Clear Words composed by the master Candrakirti.🔽

original: me dang bud shing brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: me dang bud shing brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This concludes the commentary on the tenth chapter, the analysis of fire and fuel, in the Ornament of the Middle Way.

original: // /'dir smras pa /🔽bdag ni yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: // /'dir smras pa / bdag ni yod pa nyid de /
translated: Here, someone might say,

original: 'khor ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “The self exists because cyclic existence exists.

original: gal te bdag yod par ma gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te bdag yod par ma gyur na ni /
translated: If the self did not exist,

original: 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i ngo bor skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas gang zhig 'khor bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i ngo bor skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas gang zhig 'khor bar 'gyur //
translated: who would go and come in the cyclic existence of the five transmigrations, passing from one birth and death to another?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang //
translated: The Bhagavat said,

original: dge slong dag skye ba dang rga shi'i 'khor ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med do //
analyzed: dge slong dag skye ba dang rga shi'i 'khor ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med do //
translated: ‘Monks, the cyclic existence of birth and aging and death is without a beginning and without an end.

original: sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang ldan pa //🔽sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba can //
analyzed: sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang ldan pa // sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba can //
translated: Sentient beings, obscured by ignorance,🔽bound by the fetters of craving,

original: sred pa'i lu gu rgyud kyis bcings pa //
analyzed: sred pa'i lu gu rgyud kyis bcings pa //
translated: bound by the chain of craving,

original: 'khor zhing rgyug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'khor zhing rgyug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon no zhes gsungs so //
translated: wander on, and the beginning of their wandering is not seen.’

original: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pas 'khor ba yod pa de'i tshe 'khor ba po yang yod la //
analyzed: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pas 'khor ba yod pa de'i tshe 'khor ba po yang yod la //
translated: When the Lord taught that cyclic existence exists, then one who cycles exists.

original: de la yang bdag ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la yang bdag ces bya'o //
translated: And that is called the self.

original: brjod par bya ste //
analyzed: brjod par bya ste //
translated: We reply:

original: gal te 'khor ba nyid yod na //
analyzed: gal te 'khor ba nyid yod na //
translated: If cyclic existence itself existed,

original: bdag kyang yod par 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag kyang yod par 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: then the self would exist. But it does not.🔽For,

original: 'di ltar / sngon mtha' sngon nam zhes zhus tshe //
analyzed: 'di ltar / sngon mtha' sngon nam zhes zhus tshe //
translated: When asked about the prior limit,

original: thub pa chen pos min zhes gsungs //🔽'khor ba thog ma mtha' med de //
analyzed: thub pa chen pos min zhes gsungs // 'khor ba thog ma mtha' med de //
translated: the Great Sage said, “It does not. ”🔽Cyclic existence has no beginning

original: de la sngon med phyi ma med //
analyzed: de la sngon med phyi ma med //
translated: and no end.

original: mtha' dang cha dang cha shas zhes bya ba rnams ni rnam grangs so //
analyzed: mtha' dang cha dang cha shas zhes bya ba rnams ni rnam grangs so //
translated: The terms “limit,” “part,” and “portion” are synonyms.

original: sngon gyi mtha' ni sngon gyi cha zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' ni sngon gyi cha zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The prior limit is the prior part.

original: gal te 'khor ba zhes bya ba 'ga' @75b zhig yod na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'khor ba zhes bya ba 'ga' @75b zhig yod na ni /
translated: If something called “cyclic existence” existed,

original: bum pa la sogs pa dag bzhin du de la nges par sngon dang phyi ma yang yod par gyur na /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa dag bzhin du de la nges par sngon dang phyi ma yang yod par gyur na /
translated: then, like pots and so on, it would definitely have a prior beginning and a later end.

original: yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it does not exist.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
translated: For the Lord Buddha said:

original: dge slong dag skye ba dang rga shi'i 'khor ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med do zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dge slong dag skye ba dang rga shi'i 'khor ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med do zhes gsungs so //
translated: Monks, the cycle of birth, aging and death is without beginning or end.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med par gsungs pa de'i phyir 'khor ba nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar gsungs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med par gsungs pa de'i phyir 'khor ba nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar gsungs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Since the Blessed One has stated that the cycle is without beginning or end, therefore the cycle itself does not exist.

original: de'i phyir sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' ma dmigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' ma dmigs pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since neither a prior nor a posterior limit is apprehended,

original: 'khor ba med de mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: 'khor ba med de mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: the cycle does not exist, like the circle of a firebrand.

original: 'dir 'di dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir 'di dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Here, this should be analyzed:

original: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba'i sngon dang / phyi ma bkag na /🔽ji ltar dge slong dag de lta bas na /
analyzed: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba'i sngon dang / phyi ma bkag na / ji ltar dge slong dag de lta bas na /
translated: If the Blessed One has refuted a prior and posterior limit of the cycle,🔽then how could he have said, “Monks, therefore you should train in this way:

original: 'khor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir nan tan du bya'o snyam du de ltar khyed kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di gsungs she na /
analyzed: 'khor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir nan tan du bya'o snyam du de ltar khyed kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di gsungs she na /
translated: I will strive to extinguish the cycle”?

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par nye bar bkod pas de dag kho na'i 'khor ba de thog ma dang tha ma med par rtogs kyi //
analyzed: sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par nye bar bkod pas de dag kho na'i 'khor ba de thog ma dang tha ma med par rtogs kyi //
translated: The qualification “sentient beings who possess the obscuration of ignorance” and so on is stated because it is understood that their saṃsāra is without beginning and end.

original: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes kyi rlung gi shugs kyis ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'i ljon shing drungs phyung ba rnams kyis ni ma yin te /🔽'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi mas /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes kyi rlung gi shugs kyis ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'i ljon shing drungs phyung ba rnams kyis ni ma yin te / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi mas /
translated: It is not the case that those who have uprooted the tree of the obscuration of ignorance through the force of the wind of the wisdom of reality have an end.

original: nyon mongs pa'i ljon shing ma lus par bsregs pa de dag la ni mtha' yod pa nyid do zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i ljon shing ma lus par bsregs pa de dag la ni mtha' yod pa nyid do zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that those who have burned the entire tree of the afflictions with the fire of the supramundane path have an end.

original: yang ji ltar na thog ma dang bral ba rnams la tha ma yod par bstan zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na thog ma dang bral ba rnams la tha ma yod par bstan zhe na /
translated: Again, how is it that those who are without a beginning are taught to have an end?

original: phyi rol gyi 'bru la sogs pa dag la thog ma med kyang //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi 'bru la sogs pa dag la thog ma med kyang //
translated: External things such as grain have no beginning,

original: me la sogs pa dang phrad pa las tha ma yod pa ni mthong ba nyid do //
analyzed: me la sogs pa dang phrad pa las tha ma yod pa ni mthong ba nyid do //
translated: but it is seen that they have an end through contact with fire and so on.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'phags pa'i lhas /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lhas /
translated: Āryadeva said:

original: ji ltar sa bon mtha' mthong zhing //
analyzed: ji ltar sa bon mtha' mthong zhing //
translated: Just as the end of a seed is seen

original: de la thog ma yod min ltar //
analyzed: de la thog ma yod min ltar //
translated: Just as it has no beginning,🔽so also it has no end,

original: de bzhin rgyu ni ma tshang phyir //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyu ni ma tshang phyir //
translated: because the cause is incomplete.

original: skye ba 'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽zhes bshad do //
analyzed: skye ba 'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus, arising also does not occur.

original: tha ma bstan pa de yang sems can 'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams pa rnams spro bar bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: tha ma bstan pa de yang sems can 'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams pa rnams spro bar bya ba'i phyir //
translated: Moreover, this teaching of the end of cyclic existence is for the purpose of encouraging sentient beings who are imprisoned in the prison of cyclic existence.

original: 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la gzhug te /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la gzhug te /
translated: It is presented in terms of worldly convention.

original: 'jig rten pa'i shes pa la ltos nas mdzad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i shes pa la ltos nas mdzad pa yin te /
translated: It is done in terms of worldly consciousness.

original: dngos po sems pa yin na ni /
analyzed: dngos po sems pa yin na ni /
translated: If one thinks that things exist,

original: 'khor ba nyid med na de'i phyir de zad pa lta ga la yod /🔽'dir smras pa /🔽'jig rten pa'i shes pa la ltos te tha ma ltar thog @76a * //
analyzed: 'khor ba nyid med na de'i phyir de zad pa lta ga la yod / 'dir smras pa / 'jig rten pa'i shes pa la ltos te tha ma ltar thog @76a * //
translated: then cyclic existence itself would not exist. Therefore, how could its exhaustion exist?

original: ma yang ci ste ma gsungs she na /
analyzed: ma yang ci ste ma gsungs she na /
translated: Here, someone might say, “Just as you teach an end of cyclic existence in terms of worldly consciousness, why do you not also teach a beginning of cyclic existence?”

original: brjod pa / rgyu med pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: brjod pa / rgyu med pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: We reply: Because the error of causelessness would follow.

original: 'jig rten pa'i shes pa la ltos nas kyang 'khor ba'i thog ma med de /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i shes pa la ltos nas kyang 'khor ba'i thog ma med de /
translated: Even in terms of worldly consciousness, cyclic existence has no beginning.

original: de'i phyir gnyi ga ltar yang thog ma med pa nyid do zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyi ga ltar yang thog ma med pa nyid do zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that in both cases, cyclic existence has no beginning.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say,

original: gal te yang 'khor ba la thog ma dang tha ma gnyis yod pa ma yin mod kyi de lta na yang ma 'gags pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te yang 'khor ba la thog ma dang tha ma gnyis yod pa ma yin mod kyi de lta na yang ma 'gags pa'i phyir /
translated: Even though cyclic existence does not have both a beginning and an end,

original: dbus yod pa yin no //
analyzed: dbus yod pa yin no //
translated: nevertheless, since it has a middle,

original: de'i phyir 'khor ba yod de //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'khor ba yod de //
translated: cyclic existence exists.

original: dbus yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbus yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has a middle.

original: 'dir gang yod pa ma yin pa de la ni dbus med de //
analyzed: 'dir gang yod pa ma yin pa de la ni dbus med de //
translated: Here, that which does not exist does not have a middle,

original: dper na rus sbal gyi spu'i gos bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rus sbal gyi spu'i gos bzhin no //
translated: like the cloth of a tortoise hair.

original: khyod ni bzhad gang bya bar 'os pa zhig ste /🔽gang la thog ma tha med pa //
analyzed: khyod ni bzhad gang bya bar 'os pa zhig ste / gang la thog ma tha med pa //
translated: You are the one who is laughable,🔽For how could that which has no beginning and end

original: de la dbus ni ga la yod //
analyzed: de la dbus ni ga la yod //
translated: Have a middle?

original: ma yin nam /
analyzed: ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not so?

original: thog ma zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thog ma zhes bya ba ni /
translated: What is called “beginning”

original: je dang sngon dang dang po la zhes bya'o //
analyzed: je dang sngon dang dang po la zhes bya'o //
translated: is called “first,” “prior,” and “initial.”

original: tha ma zhes bya ba ni mtha' dang mjug dang rgyun chad pa la bya'o //
analyzed: tha ma zhes bya ba ni mtha' dang mjug dang rgyun chad pa la bya'o //
translated: What is called “end” is called “final,” “last,” and “annihilation.”

original: 'khor ba gang la thog ma dang tha ma bkag pa de la dbus yod par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: 'khor ba gang la thog ma dang tha ma bkag pa de la dbus yod par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could that cyclic existence which has been refuted as having a beginning and end have a middle?

original: de'i phyir 'khor ba ni nam mkha' ltar thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus dang bral ba'i phyir ming tsam zhig tu zad de /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'khor ba ni nam mkha' ltar thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus dang bral ba'i phyir ming tsam zhig tu zad de /
translated: Therefore, since cyclic existence is free from a beginning, end, and middle, like space, it is just a name.

original: mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: It is like the circle of a firebrand and so on.

original: 'khor ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'khor ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Since cyclic existence does not exist,

original: bdag kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the self also does not exist.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: de ltar 'khor ba la thog ma dang / tha ma dang dbus dag med pa de nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba med pas //
analyzed: de ltar 'khor ba la thog ma dang / tha ma dang dbus dag med pa de nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba med pas //
translated: since cyclic existence is free from a beginning, end, and middle, cyclic existence does not exist.

original: skye ba dang / rga shi la sogs pa rnams la snga ba dang phyi ba rnams dang lhan cig pa'i rim pa yang yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes gsungs pa //
analyzed: skye ba dang / rga shi la sogs pa rnams la snga ba dang phyi ba rnams dang lhan cig pa'i rim pa yang yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes gsungs pa //
translated: Therefore, birth, aging, death, and so on do not have a sequence of earlier, later, and simultaneous.🔽Therefore, earlier, later, and simultaneous

original: de phyir de la snga phyi dang // lhan cig rim pa mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de phyir de la snga phyi dang // lhan cig rim pa mi 'thad do //
translated: are untenable.

original: ji ltar mi 'thad pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /🔽gal te skye ba sngar 'gyur la //
analyzed: ji ltar mi 'thad pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / gal te skye ba sngar 'gyur la //
translated: To demonstrate why they are untenable,🔽If birth were earlier

original: rga shi phyi ma yin na ni //
analyzed: rga shi phyi ma yin na ni //
translated: and aging and death were later,

original: skye ba rga shi med pa dang // ma shi bar yang skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: skye ba rga shi med pa dang // ma shi bar yang skye bar 'gyur //
translated: And birth would occur without death, And one would be born without having died.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is stated.

original: gal te skye ba snga mar gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te skye ba snga mar gyur na ni /
translated: If birth occurred earlier,

original: de'i tshe rga shi dang bral bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i tshe rga shi dang bral bar 'gyur na /
translated: then it would be free from aging and death.

original: rga ba la sogs pa dang bral ba ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: rga ba la sogs pa dang bral ba ni mi rung ste /
translated: But it is not tenable that it is free from aging and so on,

original: 'dus ma byas nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it is unconditioned.

original: rga shi dang bral ba'i dngos po la skye ba yod par rtog pa na /
analyzed: rga shi dang bral ba'i dngos po la skye ba yod par rtog pa na /
translated: If you imagine that birth exists for a thing that is free from aging and death,

original: lha sbyin gzhan du ma shi bar 'dir dang por skye bar rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha sbyin gzhan du ma shi bar 'dir dang por skye bar rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be understood that Devadatta is born here for the first time without having died elsewhere.

original: de'i phyir 'khor ba la thog ma yod par 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'khor ba la thog ma yod par 'gyur zhing //
translated: Therefore cyclic existence would have a beginning.

original: rgyu med pa'i nyes par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu med pa'i nyes par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And the error of its being causeless would also ensue.

original: bdag @76b 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur to zhes de ltar sngon gyi mtha' la rtogs par yang mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: bdag @76b 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur to zhes de ltar sngon gyi mtha' la rtogs par yang mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: And it would not be the case that “I existed in the past,” and one would not understand the prior limit in that way.

original: sngon byung bar ma gyur pa las phyis 'dir skye bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon byung bar ma gyur pa las phyis 'dir skye bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And one would be born here later from what did not exist previously.

original: ci ste ji ltar aa mra la sogs pa rnams sngar rga shi dang 'brel pa med par yang dang po kho nar skye bar mthong ste /
analyzed: ci ste ji ltar aa mra la sogs pa rnams sngar rga shi dang 'brel pa med par yang dang po kho nar skye bar mthong ste /
translated: But if you think that just as mangos and so on are seen to arise first, without being related to aging and death,

original: de bzhin du bdag kyang yin no snyam na /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag kyang yin no snyam na /
translated: so too is the self,

original: de ltar ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //🔽aa mra la sogs pa rnams kyang ni rang gi sa bon 'gags par gyur pa na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro // aa mra la sogs pa rnams kyang ni rang gi sa bon 'gags par gyur pa na /
translated: Because it is the same as what is being proven.🔽Mangos and so on arise from their own seeds, but they do not arise without the prior cessation of the seed.

original: skye ba'i phyir gzhan du ma zhig pa skye ba ma yin pas 'di ni gong ma dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: skye ba'i phyir gzhan du ma zhig pa skye ba ma yin pas 'di ni gong ma dang mtshungs so //
translated: Therefore this is the same as the previous example.

original: ci ste sa bon ni shing las gzhan nyid yin te /
analyzed: ci ste sa bon ni shing las gzhan nyid yin te /
translated: But if you think that the seed is different from the tree,

original: de'i phyir shing gi skye ba ni gzhan du ma zhig pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid do snyam na /
analyzed: de'i phyir shing gi skye ba ni gzhan du ma zhig pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid do snyam na /
translated: and therefore the arising of the tree is preceded by the noncessation of something else,

original: de ltar ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gzhan nyid yin par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gzhan nyid yin par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not established that cause and effect are different.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: As it is said:

original: gang la brten te gang 'byung ba //
analyzed: gang la brten te gang 'byung ba //
translated: That which arises in dependence on this

original: de ni re zhig de nyid min //
analyzed: de ni re zhig de nyid min //
translated: is not this,

original: de ni gzhan yang ma yin te //
analyzed: de ni gzhan yang ma yin te //
translated: It is not something else.

original: de phyir chad min rtag ma yin //
analyzed: de phyir chad min rtag ma yin //
translated: Therefore, it is not annihilated, nor is it eternal.

original: zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained.

original: de phyir sa bon las shing gzhan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de phyir sa bon las shing gzhan nyid ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, a tree is not different from its seed.

original: des na 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the same as what is to be established.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: gzhan du ma shi ba la 'dir skye ba yod pa yang ma yin pa de'i phyir skye ba snga ma yin par khas blang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ma shi ba la 'dir skye ba yod pa yang ma yin pa de'i phyir skye ba snga ma yin par khas blang bar mi bya'o //
translated: it is not the case that one is born here without having died elsewhere. Therefore, one should not accept that there is a prior birth.

original: ci ste rga shi snga la skye ba 'phyi ba yin na ni /
analyzed: ci ste rga shi snga la skye ba 'phyi ba yin na ni /
translated: But if aging and death occur earlier and birth occurs later,

original: de lta na yang /
