analyzed: // /'dir smras pa / dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni yod pa nyid de /
translated: Here someone might say,

original: 'khor ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “The nature of things does exist because cyclic existence exists.

original: 'di na 'khor bas na 'khor ba ste /
analyzed: 'di na 'khor bas na 'khor ba ste /
translated: Here, because of cycling, there is cyclic existence.

original: 'gro bas na 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro ba la 'khor ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro bas na 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro ba la 'khor ba zhes bya'o //
translated: “Transmigration” is so called because of going from one transmigration to another.

original: gal te dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na /
translated: If the intrinsic reality of things does not exist,

original: de'i tshe su zhig 'gro ba nas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro zhing 'khor bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i tshe su zhig 'gro ba nas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro zhing 'khor bar 'gyur /
translated: then who goes from one transmigration to another transmigration and transmigrates?

original: mo gsham gyi bu'i 'du byed yod pa ma yin pa dag ni 'khor bar ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu'i 'du byed yod pa ma yin pa dag ni 'khor bar ma mthong ngo //
translated: The compositional activity of the son of a barren woman, which does not exist, is not seen to transmigrate.

original: de'i phyir 'khor ba yod pas dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yod pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'khor ba yod pas dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yod pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, since transmigration exists, the intrinsic reality of things also exists.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We respond:

original: gal te 'khor ba nyid yod na dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: gal te 'khor ba nyid yod na dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If transmigration itself existed, then the intrinsic reality of things would also exist.

original: yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it does not exist.

original: 'dir gal te 'khor ba yod na ni nges par 'du byed dag gam sems can zhig der 'gyur grang /
analyzed: 'dir gal te 'khor ba yod na ni nges par 'du byed dag gam sems can zhig der 'gyur grang /
translated: Here, if transmigration exists, then it would definitely be either compositional activity or sentient beings.

original: gnyi ga ltar yang nyes pa yod do zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang nyes pa yod do zhes gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that there is a fault in both cases:

original: gal te 'du byed 'khor zhe na //
analyzed: gal te 'du byed 'khor zhe na //
translated: If you say compositional activity transmigrates,

original: de dag rtag na mi 'khor te //
analyzed: de dag rtag na mi 'khor te //
translated: It does not transmigrate if it is permanent.

original: mi rtag na yang 'khor mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mi rtag na yang 'khor mi 'gyur //
translated: If they are impermanent, they do not cycle.

original: sems can la yang rim 'di mtshungs //
analyzed: sems can la yang rim 'di mtshungs //
translated: This same argument applies to sentient beings.

original: de la gal te 'du byed dag 'khor bar rtog na ni /
analyzed: de la gal te 'du byed dag 'khor bar rtog na ni /
translated: If you imagine that formations cycle,

original: ci rtag pa'am mi rtag pa dag cig 'khor grang /
analyzed: ci rtag pa'am mi rtag pa dag cig 'khor grang /
translated: do permanent or impermanent formations cycle?

original: de la rtag pa dag ni mi 'khor te /
analyzed: de la rtag pa dag ni mi 'khor te /
translated: Permanent formations do not cycle,

original: bya ba dang bral ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: bya ba dang bral ba'i phyir te /
translated: because they are devoid of activity.

original: bum pa la sogs pa mi rtag pa rnams kho na bya ba dang bcas par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa mi rtag pa rnams kho na bya ba dang bcas par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Impermanent formations are observed to have activity, like a pot, etc.

original: 'on te mi rtag pa dag yin na ni //
analyzed: 'on te mi rtag pa dag yin na ni //
translated: But if they are impermanent,

original: gang mi rtag pa de dag ni skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa yin la ;🔽gang dag zhig ba de dag ni yod pa ma yin pas mo gsham gyi bu'i 'du byed dag bzhin du /
analyzed: gang mi rtag pa de dag ni skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa yin la ; gang dag zhig ba de dag ni yod pa ma yin pas mo gsham gyi bu'i 'du byed dag bzhin du /
translated: then those that are impermanent cease as soon as they arise.

original: 'gar yang 'phyan par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gar yang 'phyan par ga la 'gyur /
translated: And those that cease do not exist, so how could they wander anywhere, like the formations of the son of a barren woman?

original: de ltar na mi rtag pa rnams kyang 'khor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na mi rtag pa rnams kyang 'khor ba ma yin no //
translated: Thus impermanent formations also do not cycle.

original: ci ste 'du byed rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas rim pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rgyun chags su 'jug pa mi rtag par gyur pa dag kho na 'khor ro snyam na /
analyzed: ci ste 'du byed rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas rim pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rgyun chags su 'jug pa mi rtag par gyur pa dag kho na 'khor ro snyam na /
translated: But if you think that formations that are impermanent and merely pass on from one cause to one effect in an uninterrupted continuum cycle,

original: 'di yang mi 'thad de /🔽re zhig 'bras bu skye ba gar yin pa de la ni 'khor ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang mi 'thad de / re zhig 'bras bu skye ba gar yin pa de la ni 'khor ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: that also is untenable.

original: gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba'i phyir dang / gar yang mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba'i phyir dang / gar yang mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: First, that which is the arising of an effect does not cycle because it does not come from anywhere and it does not go anywhere.

original: rgyu zhig par gyur ba gang yin pa de la yang @94b 'khor ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu zhig par gyur ba gang yin pa de la yang @94b 'khor ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Also, that which is the disintegration of a cause does not cycle.
